quote: I definitely do like change. I don't know if my hairstyles reflect that, but I don't like the same old thing all the time.
author: Cobi Jones

quote: As you grow older, you learn a few things. One of them is to actually take the time you've allotted for vacation.
author: John Battelle

quote: I believe in God, who made of one blood all nations that on earth do dwell. I believe that all men, black and brown and white, are brothers, varying through time and opportunity, in form and gift and feature, but differing in no essential particular, and alike in soul and the possibility of infinite development.
author: W. E. B. Du Bois

quote: Life is a series of steps. Things are done gradually. Once in a while there is a giant step, but most of the time we are taking small, seemingly insignificant steps on the stairway of life.
author: Ralph Ransom

quote: Each of us should think of the future. Every puff on a cigarette is another tick closer to a time bomb of terrible consequences. Christopher Hitchens didn't care about the consequences of smoking cigarettes. Tragically, he died of throat cancer in December 2011.
author: Ray Comfort

quote: You can assume that the leaf you see let go of a branch and fall towards the ground has never been considered by any being but yourself. Catch it in your hand - or, even better, keep walking until one falls into your reach naturally - and it will have spent its whole time on the planet without ever touching the ground, only because of you.
author: Eliot Schrefer

quote: The most valuable live thing for me is when people look like they're having a good time.
author: Grimes
category: Good, Me, Having A Good Time

quote: Time stays long enough for anyone who will use it.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: You can't please everybody. You'd be crazy if you're trying to. So take some time out to do some things for yourself.
author: Nas

quote: I think what's been lacking from our discussion for a long time is really that other part of what a Budget chair does, which is set the priorities for this country in terms of making sure we invest in the right places, in education, in job training, and to make sure we do a balanced approach moving forward.
author: Patty Murray

quote: Employ your time in improving yourself by other men's writings, so that you shall gain easily what others have labored hard for.
author: Socrates

quote: If I have made an appointment with you, I owe you punctuality, I have no right to throw away your time, if I do my own.
author: Richard Cecil

quote: When people divorce, it's always such a tragedy. At the same time, if people stay together it can be even worse.
author: Monica Bellucci

quote: When you run the marathon, you run against the distance, not against the other runners and not against the time.
author: Haile Gebrselassie

quote: Instead of worrying about what people say of you, why not spend time trying to accomplish something they will admire.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: I try to look cute all the time.
author: Sloane Stephens

quote: There is never time in the future in which we will work out our salvation. The challenge is in the moment the time is always now.
author: James A. Baldwin

quote: Oh, I just want what we all want: a comfortable couch, a nice beverage, a weekend of no distractions and a book that will stop time, lift me out of my quotidian existence and alter my thinking forever.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: If you aim at nothing, you'll hit it every time.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: To achieve great things, two things are needed; a plan, and not quite enough time.
author: Leonard Bernstein

quote: Nothing great is created suddenly, any more than a bunch of grapes or a fig. If you tell me that you desire a fig. I answer you that there must be time. Let it first blossom, then bear fruit, then ripen.
author: Epictetus

quote: You can't just ask customers what they want and then try to give that to them. By the time you get it built, they'll want something new.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: I believe in dressing for the occasion. There's a time for sweater, sneakers and Levis and a time for the full-dress jazz.
author: Ginger Rogers

quote: I really don't think in the past. I sit down with many friends at dinner, and they like to talk about the good old days. I'm respectful of the good old days, but I find myself spending very little time reminiscing. I'm really looking forward.
author: Donald Bren

quote: Time is a circus, always packing up and moving away.
author: Ben Hecht

quote: People who cannot find time for recreation are obliged sooner or later to find time for illness.
author: John Wanamaker

quote: For time is the longest distance between two places.
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: It's time for the human race to enter the solar system.
author: Dan Quayle

quote: Having soon discovered to be great, I must appear so, and therefore studiously avoided mixing in society, and wrapped myself in mystery, devoting my time to fasting and prayer.
author: Nat Turner

quote: I'm having a great time. It's like I'm on some ridiculous big roller coaster not knowing what's happening next, but just having a great time on the ride.
author: Samantha Mumba

quote: I'm just here for good times, man. I want people to have the best time ever. Especially if they're around me.
author: Travis Scott

quote: Time is the least thing we have of.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: You got to be willing to walk in a storm. That's what I tell people all the time.
author: Ray Lewis

quote: The beauty of our country is that when it was founded that they took some time to lay out civil liberties in the first 10 Amendments - the Bill of Rights. I'm a firm believer in those civil liberties and the ability to have your own opinion.
author: Aaron Rodgers

quote: Anything that's not positive, I don't have the energy to focus on it. Anything that's not going in the right direction, I don't have the time or the energy.
author: DMX

quote: Imagination makes us aware of limitless possibilities. How many of us haven't pondered the concept of infinity or imagined the possibility of time travel? In one of her poems, Emily Bronte likens imagination to a constant companion, but I prefer to think of it as a built-in entertainment system.
author: Alexandra Adornetto

quote: If you have a chance to accomplish something that will make things better for people coming behind you, and you don't do that, you are wasting your time on this earth.
author: Roberto Clemente

quote: Procrastination is the thief of time.
author: Edward Young

quote: Time is the most valuable thing on earth: time to think, time to act, time to extend our fraternal relations, time to become better men, time to become better women, time to become better and more independent citizens.
author: Samuel Gompers

quote: The two most important requirements for major success are: first, being in the right place at the right time, and second, doing something about it.
author: Ray Kroc

quote: 'Back To Love' is a way of letting people know that sometimes you get caught up in trying to be successful in school or in your social life, and it's a reminder not to forget that each day people are getting older. Nobody is promised tomorrow, so we should make sure that we spend quality time with quality people.
author: Anthony Hamilton

quote: I just love to see people having a good time.
author: Garth Brooks

quote: To be a Negro in this country and to be relatively conscious is to be in a rage almost all the time.
author: James A. Baldwin

quote: The pressure on young chefs today is far greater than ever before in terms of social skills, marketing skills, cooking skills, personality and, more importantly, delivering on the plate. So you need to be strong. Physically fit. So my chefs get weighed every time they come into the kitchen.
author: Gordon Ramsay

quote: Now, you lose something in your life, or you come into a conflict, and there's gonna come a time that you're gonna know: There was a reason for that. And at the end of your life, all the things you thought were periods, they turn out to be commas. There was never a full stop in any of it.
author: Matthew McConaughey

quote: It's always good to see the world; always good to see new places. When I'm sitting at home, one of the great things is when my daughter and I watch TV, and when she sees or hears about a place for the first time, I tell her, 'Daddy's been there!'
author: Roman Reigns

quote: There was a time when nails were high-tech. There was a time when people had to be told how to use a telephone. Technology is just a tool. People use tools to improve their lives.
author: Tom Clancy

quote: The police can't protect consumers. People need to be more aware and educated about identity theft. You need to be a little bit wiser, a little bit smarter and there's nothing wrong with being skeptical. We live in a time when if you make it easy for someone to steal from you, someone will.
author: Frank Abagnale

quote: I worry about kids today not having time to build a tree house or ride a bike or go fishing. I worry that life is getting faster and faster.
author: John Lasseter

quote: 'Friday Night Lights' was kind of like my college years because I did four seasons of that. It was my first series. It was the most time I had with one character, and kind of growing and evolving with the character over that long of a span of time, it just allows you to sort of learn in a completely different way that I had never experienced.
author: Jesse Plemons

quote: Silence is as deep as eternity, speech a shallow as time.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Our most important task is to transform our consciousness so that violence is no longer an option for us in our personal lives, that understanding that a world of peace is possible only if we relate to each other as peaceful beings, one individual at a time.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: When you play soccer, most of the time you got to get the ball moving, but once you get into that attacking third you gotta' be creative, you gotta' let your talent take over.
author: Freddy Adu

quote: It's like going back to school. You know, autumn! Time for 'Harry Potter'.
author: Robbie Coltraine

quote: I don't want any title. I just say what I say, and hopefully somebody gets it, man. I'm not perfect, and I'm just here and trying to make a dollar, and being real at the same time, you know?
author: Nas

quote: There is no right time and right place for love... it can happen any time.
author: Shah Rukh Khan

quote: Television is a medium of entertainment which permits millions of people to listen to the same joke at the same time, and yet remain lonesome.
author: T. S. Eliot

quote: Spend some time this weekend on home improvement improve your attitude toward your family.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: It's not a bad idea to occasionally spend a little time thinking about things you take for granted. Plain everyday things.
author: Evan Davis

quote: Meditation is to dive all the way within, beyond thought, to the source of thought and pure consciousness. It enlarges the container, every time you transcend. When you come out, you come out refreshed, filled with energy and enthusiasm for life.
author: David Lynch

quote: Luck has nothing to do with it, because I have spent many, many hours, countless hours, on the court working for my one moment in time, not knowing when it would come.
author: Serena Williams

quote: For a time in high school, I had glasses, braces, and a cast. I like to call this look 'no date for homecoming.'
author: Lauren Graham

quote: Time is but the stream I go a-fishing in.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I developed a problem with authority. Any time that authority was what I interpreted as being unjust, I stood up to it, and that became my personality.
author: Tom Petty

quote: If you do a good job for others, you heal yourself at the same time, because a dose of joy is a spiritual cure. It transcends all barriers.
author: Ed Sullivan

quote: Take time to appreciate employees and they will reciprocate in a thousand ways.
author: Bob Nelson

quote: We need to internalize this idea of excellence. Not many folks spend a lot of time trying to be excellent.
author: Barack Obama

quote: It's always refreshing to step into another time.
author: Diane Lane

quote: There's no point in making predictions. It's not worth speculating because nothing is set in stone and things change all the time in football. Today there are opportunities that no one knows if they will come round again in the future.
author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quote: Each person is an enigma. You're a puzzle not only to yourself but also to everyone else, and the great mystery of our time is how we penetrate this puzzle.
author: Theodore Zeldin

quote: You've got to know what you want. This is central to acting on your intentions. When you know what you want, you realize that all there is left then is time management. You'll manage your time to achieve your goals because you clearly know what you're trying to achieve in your life.
author: Patch Adams

quote: I was in enough to get along with people. I was never socially inarticulate. Not a loner. And that saved my life, saved my sanity. That and the writing. But to this day I distrust anybody who thought school was a good time. Anybody.
author: Stephen King

quote: If I were a liberal Democrat, people would say I'm the super genius of all time. The super genius of all time. If you're a conservative Republican, you've got to fight for your life. It's really an amazing thing.
author: Donald Trump

quote: This is the key to time management - to see the value of every moment.
author: Menachem Mendel Schneerson

quote: You want a friend who's going to tell you the truth. That's what it's about. If you don't have a friend who's going to tell you the truth every time something comes up, you feel like he's not a true friend.
author: Donald Driver

quote: You know, people talk about this being an uncertain time. You know, all time is uncertain. I mean, it was uncertain back in - in 2007, we just didn't know it was uncertain. It was - uncertain on September 10th, 2001. It was uncertain on October 18th, 1987, you just didn't know it.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: In all natural disasters through time, man needs to attach meaning to tragedy, no matter how random and inexplicable the event is.
author: Nathaniel Philbrick

quote: Time is the friend of the wonderful company, the enemy of the mediocre.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: There never is a good time for tough decisions. There will always be an election or something else. You have to pick courage and do it. Governance is about taking tough, even unpopular, decisions.
author: Jairam Ramesh

quote: If we were motivated by money, we would have sold the company a long time ago and ended up on a beach.
author: Larry Page

quote: Leadership is all about taking people on a journey. The challenge is that most of the time, we are asking people to follow us to places we ourselves have never been.
author: Andy Stanley

quote: In my opinion, the only way to conquer stage fright is to get up on stage and play. Every time you play another show, it gets better and better.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: We provoke a shark every time we enter the water where sharks happen to be, for we forget: The ocean is not our territory - it's theirs.
author: Peter Benchley

quote: Time passes irrevocably.
author: Virgil

quote: We must find new lands from which we can easily obtain raw materials and at the same time exploit the cheap slave labor that is available from the natives of the colonies. The colonies would also provide a dumping ground for the surplus goods produced in our factories.
author: Cecil Rhodes

quote: The past always looks better than it was. It's only pleasant because it isn't here.
author: Finley Peter Dunne

quote: We are so obsessed with doing that we have no time and no imagination left for being. As a result, men are valued not for what they are but for what they do or what they have - for their usefulness.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: In my own words, I played some significant part in changing the social-sexual values of our time. I had a lot of fun in the process.
author: Hugh Hefner

quote: The innocent and the beautiful have no enemy but time.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: Each time dawn appears, the mystery is there in its entirety.
author: Rene Daumal

quote: I have moments where I miss my old self. But I think anyone can get caught up in what we used to have. But at the same time, we can choose to focus on the beauty of now.
author: Steve Gleason

quote: Freedom isn't free. It shouldn't be a bragging point that 'Oh, I don't get involved in politics,' as if that makes someone cleaner. No, that makes you derelict of duty in a republic. Liars and panderers in government would have a much harder time of it if so many people didn't insist on their right to remain ignorant and blindly agreeable.
author: Bill Maher

quote: Stop being a critic and be a light; don't be a judge, be a model. I think we are far too critical. I think the best way to correct behavior is to accentuate and affirm positive behavior and to ignore negative behavior. Generally speaking, there is a time to correct, of course; but my biggest advice would be, 'Affirm your child.'
author: Sean Covey

quote: I started singing about three years ago, I entered a local singing competition called Stratford Idol. The other people in the competition had been taking singing lessons and had vocal coaches. I wasn't taking it too seriously at the time, I would just sing around the house. I was only 12 and I got second place.
author: Justin Bieber

quote: Everyone who achieves success in a great venture, solves each problem as they came to it. They helped themselves. And they were helped through powers known and unknown to them at the time they set out on their voyage. They keep going regardless of the obstacles they met.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: We are drowning in information, while starving for wisdom. The world henceforth will be run by synthesizers, people able to put together the right information at the right time, think critically about it, and make important choices wisely.
author: E. O. Wilson

quote: The spectacles of experience through them you will see clearly a second time.
author: Henrik Ibsen

quote: I believe time wounds all heels.
author: John Lennon

quote: Getting an audience is hard. Sustaining an audience is hard. It demands a consistency of thought, of purpose, and of action over a long period of time.
author: Bruce Springsteen

quote: Caste is a delicate issue. It's ubiquitous, and we are full of it. We should start to change things from individual level. But when you go to people and deny caste, they may not react favourably. I think if a decisive percentage of people, especially elites, start marrying out of their caste, we may see a casteless India in a generation's time.
author: Pawan Kalyan

quote: The senses deceive from time to time, and it is prudent never to trust wholly those who have deceived us even once.
author: Rene Descartes

quote: Lose not yourself in a far off time, seize the moment that is thine.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: Treat your kid like a darling for the first five years. For the next five years, scold them. By the time they turn sixteen, treat them like a friend. Your grown up children are your best friends.
author: Chanakya

quote: It was just something - I didn't agree with what the flag was representing at this time, and you know, if you look at the original picture where people addressed it, I was trying to sit behind the coolers and out of the way, 'cause I didn't want to interrupt anybody else's right to stand and hold attention to the flag.
author: Colin Kaepernick

quote: He who is too busy doing good finds no time to be good.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: I try not to worry about the future - so I take each day just one anxiety attack at a time.
author: Tom Wilson

quote: I enjoy spending time at home or going out for a quiet meal in a restaurant.
author: Jamie Redknapp

quote: I'm a really nice guy when you meet me, and that surprises a lot of people. I'm not that eccentric in real life - and certainly not that disrespectful. In my own time, I like to just chill out with friends and not get in people's faces.
author: KSI

quote: If ants are such busy workers, how come they find time to go to all the picnics?
author: Marie Dressler

quote: I think my mother is my biggest influence. There are so many things I hate about her but at the same time I'm thankful for her. All I know is that when I'm a parent I want to be just like my mom. I can talk to my mom more than any of my friends could talk to their parents.
author: Nikki Reed

quote: I just think Valentine's Day is a day to really appreciate the person you love, no matter who it is, and to spend time with them. I don't think it's all about fancy presents or whatever. I think it's about spending that quality time with that special person.
author: Prince Royce

quote: I think it's time we all agree that gender stereotypes are simply the confabulation of our own mind.
author: Naveen Jain

quote: Once you have mastered time, you will understand how true it is that most people overestimate what they can accomplish in a year - and underestimate what they can achieve in a decade!
author: Tony Robbins

quote: When one makes a Revolution, one cannot mark time; one must always go forward - or go back. He who now talks about the 'freedom of the press' goes backward, and halts our headlong course towards Socialism.
author: Vladimir Lenin

quote: A financial crisis is a great time for professional investors and a horrible time for average ones.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: Time flies never to be recalled.
author: Virgil

quote: At the time I was arrested I had no idea it would turn into this. It was just a day like any other day. The only thing that made it significant was that the masses of the people joined in.
author: Rosa Parks

quote: When the faith is strong enough, it is sufficient just to be. It's a journey towards simplicity, towards quietness, towards a kind of joy that is not in time. It's a journey that has taken us from primary identification with our body and our psyche, on to an identification with God, and ultimately beyond identification.
author: Ram Dass

quote: Time is the most valuable thing a man can spend.
author: Theophrastus

quote: The mind of America is seized by a fatal dry rot - and it's only a question of time before all that the mind controls will run amuck in a frenzy of stupid, impotent fear.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: It took me quite a long time to develop a voice, and now that I have it, I am not going to be silent.
author: Madeleine Albright

quote: At a time like this, scorching irony, not convincing argument, is needed.
author: Frederick Douglass

quote: The time is right for electric cars - in fact the time is critical.
author: Carlos Ghosn

quote: The only time I waste is time I spend doing something that, in my gut, I know I shouldn't. If I choose to spend time playing video games or sleeping in, then it's time well spent, because I chose to do it. I did it for a reason - to relax, to decompress or to feel good, and that was what I wanted to do.
author: Simon Sinek

quote: Time is a sort of river of passing events, and strong is its current; no sooner is a thing brought to sight than it is swept by and another takes its place, and this too will be swept away.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Time is the wisest counselor of all.
author: Pericles

quote: In tough times, some of us see protecting the climate as a luxury, but that's an outdated 20th-century worldview from a time when we thought industrialization was the end goal, waste was growth, and wealth meant a thick haze of air pollution.
author: Alex Steffen

quote: If you give a good thing to the world, then over time your karma will be good, and you'll receive good.
author: Russell Simmons

quote: My life is full of drama, and I don't have time to worry about something as petty as what I look like.
author: Adele

quote: A lot of people think international relations is like a game of chess. But it's not a game of chess, where people sit quietly, thinking out their strategy, taking their time between moves. It's more like a game of billiards, with a bunch of balls clustered together.
author: Madeleine Albright

quote: I try to do the right thing at the right time. They may just be little things, but usually they make the difference between winning and losing.
author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: I always had a philosophy which I got from my father. He used to say, 'Listen. God gave to you the gift to play football. This is your gift from God. If you take care of your health, if you are in good shape all the time, with your gift from God no one will stop you, but you must be prepared.'
author: Pele

quote: I would say that a good shoe is exactly like a good wine. These shoes are going to stay and last for a long time.
author: Christian Louboutin

quote: Life is hardly more than a fraction of a second. Such a little time to prepare oneself for eternity!
author: Paul Gauguin

quote: Time is something that interests me a whole lot - past and present, and how the past appears as people change.
author: Alice Munro

quote: We learn from our gardens to deal with the most urgent question of the time: How much is enough?
author: Wendell Berry

quote: I was never very good at exams, having a poor memory and finding the examination process rather artificial, and there never seemed to be enough time to follow up things that really interested me.
author: Paul Nurse

quote: I visualize a time when we will be to robots what dogs are to humans, and I'm rooting for the machines.
author: Claude Shannon

quote: A lot of people are crazy, cruel and negative. They got a little too much time on their hands to discuss everybody else. I have a limited amount of energy to blow in a day. I'd rather read something that I like or watch a program I enjoy or ride my damn motorcycle or throw back a couple of shots of tequila with my friends.
author: Queen Latifah

quote: I can be a goofball sometimes. I love having a good time and being carefree.
author: Spencer Boldman

quote: All my time not devoted to my master's service was spent either in prayer, or in making experiments in casting different things in moulds made of earth, in attempting to make paper, gunpowder, and many other experiments, that, although I could not perfect, yet convinced me of its practicability if I had the means.
author: Nat Turner

quote: Friends are thieves of time.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: Everything happens to everybody sooner or later if there is time enough.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Boxing is the ultimate challenge. There's nothing that can compare to testing yourself the way you do every time you step in the ring.
author: Sugar Ray Leonard

quote: It is a great honor to be awarded a Nobel Prize. This is a wonderful experience for my wife Betty and me. We received congratulations by email, phone and post, many from old friends we had not seen for some time.
author: Willard Boyle

quote: I decided, very early on, just to accept life unconditionally; I never expected it to do anything special for me, yet I seemed to accomplish far more than I had ever hoped. Most of the time it just happened to me without my ever seeking it.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: The God who gave us life, gave us liberty at the same time.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Live as if you were living a second time, and as though you had acted wrongly the first time.
author: Viktor E. Frankl

quote: I do love to capture beauty in this world. And photos can last the test of time.
author: Nathaniel Buzolic

quote: Strong women, when respected, make the whole society stronger. One must be careful with such rapid changes, though, and make an effort to preserve, at the same time, the positive traditions of Indian culture.
author: Chitra Banerjee Divakaruni

quote: It's very difficult to take candid portraits of children because they're moving around all the time.
author: Ren Ng

quote: My guiding principle and motivation was that I wanted to retire by the time I turned 35. There actually are two books that I bought and still have - Paul Terhost's 'Cashing In On the American Dream: How to Retire at 35' and Andrew Tobias's 'The Only Investment Guide You'll Ever Need' - that were my personal financial road map.
author: Mark Cuban

quote: Perfection is attained by slow degrees it requires the hand of time.
author: Voltaire

quote: The finest workers in stone are not copper or steel tools, but the gentle touches of air and water working at their leisure with a liberal allowance of time.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I feel that life is short, so we should be disciplined, but at the same time we should have a good time.
author: Wyclef Jean

quote: I can mention many moments that were unforgettable and revelatory. But the most single revelatory three minutes was the first time I put on scuba gear and dived on a coral reef. It's just the unbelievable fact that you can move in three dimensions.
author: David Attenborough

quote: Every time you step on the football field in between those lines you're putting your life, your career, every single ligament in your body in jeopardy.
author: Robert Griffin III

quote: It's a great time to be doing political satire when the world is on a knife edge.
author: John Oliver

quote: I must govern the clock, not be governed by it.
author: Golda Meir

quote: Time is the father of truth, its mother is our mind.
author: Giordano Bruno

quote: The Joker is my favorite villain of all time: You don't know his past you just know what his plans are.
author: The Weeknd

quote: Every time you have to speak, you are auditioning for leadership.
author: James Humes

quote: But time growing old teaches all things.
author: Aeschylus

quote: Time is flying never to return.
author: Virgil

quote: I love the sea's sounds and the way it reflects the sky. The colours that shimmer across its surface are unbelievable. This, combined with the colour of the water over white sand, surprises me every time.
author: John Dyer

quote: I don't have time for their judgement and their stupidity and you know they lay down with their ugly wives in front of their ugly children and look at their loser lives and then they look at me and they say, 'I can't process it' well, no, you never will stop trying, just sit back and enjoy the show. You know?
author: Charlie Sheen

quote: Not even the brightest future can make up for the fact that no roads lead back to what came before - to the innocence of childhood or the first time we fell in love.
author: Jo Nesbo

quote: Movie acting suits me because I only need to be good for ninety seconds at a time.
author: Bill Murray

quote: We must use time as a tool, not as a couch.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: No excuses and no sob stories. Life is full of excuses if you're looking. I have no time to gripe over misfortune. I don't waste time looking back.
author: Junior Seau

quote: Let the refining and improving of your own life keep you so busy that you have little time to criticize others.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: For me, forgiveness and compassion are always linked: how do we hold people accountable for wrongdoing and yet at the same time remain in touch with their humanity enough to believe in their capacity to be transformed?
author: bell hooks

quote: And now let me address all of you, high and low, rich and poor, one with another, to accept of mercy and grace while it is offered to you; Now is the accepted time, now is the day of salvation; and will you not accept it, now it is offered unto you?
author: George Whitefield

quote: What you lack in talent can be made up with desire, hustle and giving 110 percent all the time.
author: Don Zimmer

quote: Time can be an ally or an enemy. What it becomes depends entirely upon you, your goals, and your determination to use every available minute.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Everything has seasons, and we have to be able to recognize when something's time has passed and be able to move into the next season. Everything that is alive requires pruning as well, which is a great metaphor for endings.
author: Henry Cloud

quote: What's amazing is, if young people understood how doing well in school makes the rest of their life so much interesting, they would be more motivated. It's so far away in time that they can't appreciate what it means for their whole life.
author: Bill Gates

quote: We're all just passing time and occupy our chair very briefly.
author: John Hurt

quote: Do your best, one shot at a time and then move on. Remember that golf is just a game.
author: Nancy Lopez

quote: Deadlines aren't bad. They help you organize your time. They help you set priorities. They make you get going when you might not feel like it.
author: Harvey Mackay

quote: We all come to the point where it's time to get yourself straight, as a businesswoman, a mother, whatever you are in life. It's tough love but it's also being real with yourself. It's important to take those rose-coloured glasses off and see what's going on.
author: Kelly Rowland

quote: The nice girl thinks she's giving up something to get something better in return. She gives up control over her own life. When the time comes for her to get what she expected, she winds up disappointed. In addition to being empty-handed, she's depleted.
author: Sherry Argov

quote: Morocco has a lot to do in terms of democracy. The daily practice of democracy evolves in time. Trying to apply a Western democratic system to a country of the Maghreb, the Middle East, or the Gulf would be a mistake. We are not Germany, Sweden or Spain.
author: Mohammed VI of Morocco

quote: There is a time to take counsel of your fears, and there is a time to never listen to any fear.
author: George S. Patton

quote: America - it is a fabulous country, the only fabulous country; it is the only place where miracles not only happen, but where they happen all the time.
author: Thomas Wolfe

quote: I've learned that I can't have a packed work schedule and a packed social schedule and a packed personal life I need to just have time to myself to sit and breathe and unwind.
author: Kim Cattrall

quote: How much time he saves who does not look to see what his neighbor says or does or thinks.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: It has been my observation that most people get ahead during the time that others waste.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Anyone who says they're not afraid at the time of a hurricane is either a fool or a liar, or a little bit of both.
author: Anderson Cooper

quote: I have to think that I think it's always been a horse race between this administration's temporary political acumen and their completely, utterly, totally bankrupt policies. And they're coming home to roost. It was always a question of time. These guys aren't conservative. These guys are radicals.
author: Bradley Whitford

quote: There's nothing wrong with things taking time.
author: James Dyson

quote: I always do a mental audit at the end of the week to make sure I'm balancing time between my career and my personal life.
author: Jill Wagner

quote: I have just got a new theory of eternity.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The future is something which everyone reaches at the rate of 60 minutes an hour, whatever he does, whoever he is.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: The past cannot be cured.
author: Elizabeth I

quote: The one thing I regret is that I will never have time to read all the books I want to read.
author: Francoise Sagan

quote: You must have been warned against letting the golden hours slip by but some of them are golden only because we let them slip by.
author: James M. Barrie

quote: Time abides long enough for those who make use of it.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Time, the devourer of all things.
author: Ovid

quote: What then is time? If no one asks me, I know what it is. If I wish to explain it to him who asks, I do not know.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: The clock talked loud. I threw it away, it scared me what it talked.
author: Tillie Olsen

quote: I confess, I do not believe in time.
author: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: Lost wealth may be replaced by industry, lost knowledge by study, lost health by temperance or medicine, but lost time is gone forever.
author: Samuel Smiles

quote: Time sometimes flies like a bird, sometimes crawls like a snail; but a man is happiest when he does not even notice whether it passes swiftly or slowly.
author: Ivan Turgenev

quote: There's time enough, but none to spare.
author: Charles W. Chesnutt

quote: When in doubt, take more time.
author: John Zimmerman

quote: True time is four-dimensional.
author: Martin Heidegger

quote: So during those first moments of the day, which are yours and yours alone, you can circumvent these boundaries and concentrate fully on spiritual matters. And this gives you the opportunity to plan the time management of the entire day.
author: Menachem Mendel Schneerson

quote: Work is hard. Distractions are plentiful. And time is short.
author: Adam Hochschild

quote: October is a fine and dangerous season in America. a wonderful time to begin anything at all. You go to college, and every course in the catalogue looks wonderful.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: Everything must change and you do what you can with the changes that are made. You can't stop it. You can't fight it. Everybody tries to go back to yesterday, but you can't go back to yesterday. The only time there is, is now.
author: Marla Gibbs

quote: I spend several days at a time without enough sleep. At first, normal activities become annoying. When you are too tired to eat, you really need some sleep. A few days later, things become strange. Loud noises become louder and more startling, familiar sounds become unfamiliar, and life reinvents itself as a surrealist dream.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: When I was 17, I worked in a mentoring program in Harlem designed to improve the community. That's when I first gained an appreciation of the Harlem Renaissance, a time when African-Americans rose to prominence in American culture. For the first time, they were taken seriously as artists, musicians, writers, athletes, and as political thinkers.
author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: Aaah, summer - that long anticipated stretch of lazy, lingering days, free of responsibility and rife with possibility. It's a time to hunt for insects, master handstands, practice swimming strokes, conquer trees, explore nooks and crannies, and make new friends.
author: Darell Hammond

quote: No one remembers who climbed Mount Everest the second time.
author: Edmund Hillary

quote: We have to acknowledge that adolescence is that time of transition where we begin to introduce to children that life isn't pretty, that there are difficult things, there are hard situations, it's not fair. Bad things happen to good people.
author: Laurie Halse Anderson

quote: Century-old records are the closest thing we have to a time machine. To listen to the voice of Theodore Roosevelt or the piano playing of Claude Debussy is to feel the years falling away like autumn leaves from a maple tree.
author: Terry Teachout

quote: Time will inevitably uncover dishonesty and lies history has no place for them.
author: Norodom Sihanouk

quote: A guitar is a very personal extension of the person playing it. You have to be emotionally and spiritually connected to your instrument. I'm very brutal on my instruments, but not all the time.
author: Eddie Van Halen

quote: The winter solstice has always been special to me as a barren darkness that gives birth to a verdant future beyond imagination, a time of pain and withdrawal that produces something joyfully inconceivable, like a monarch butterfly masterfully extracting itself from the confines of its cocoon, bursting forth into unexpected glory.
author: Gary Zukav

quote: Journalism is a craft that takes years to learn. It's like golf. You never get it right all the time. It's a game of fewer errors, better facts, and better reporting.
author: Ben Huh

quote: In Einstein's equation, time is a river. It speeds up, meanders, and slows down. The new wrinkle is that it can have whirlpools and fork into two rivers. So, if the river of time can be bent into a pretzel, create whirlpools and fork into two rivers, then time travel cannot be ruled out.
author: Michio Kaku

quote: Time well spent results in more money to spend, more money to save, and more time to vacation.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: It's so important to keep a marriage alive with small treats and doing little things for each other. Just remembering to say nice things and to have listening time is vital. That ghastly phrase 'quality time' means taking three minutes to sit down and be still with someone rather than yelling over your shoulder as you rush out.
author: Joanna Lumley

quote: I think that any time of great pain is a time of transformation, a fertile time to plant new seeds.
author: Debbie Ford

quote: About the time we can make the ends meet, somebody moves the ends.
author: Herbert Hoover

quote: When asked, 'How do you write?' I invariably answer, 'one word at a time.'
author: Stephen King

quote: People who want to understand democracy should spend less time in the library with Aristotle and more time on the buses and in the subway.
author: Simeon Strunsky

quote: It's time to move on to the next step in the psychedelic revolution. We've reached a certain point, but we're not moving any more.
author: Ken Kesey

quote: The first time you say something, it's heard. The second time, it's recognized, and the third time it's learned.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: The older I get, the more I appreciate my rural childhood. I spent a lot of time outdoors, unsupervised, which is a blessing.
author: Barbara Kingsolver

quote: When you are insane, you are busy being insane - all the time.
author: Sylvia Plath

quote: There is too much disagreement for disagreement's sake. In a time of persistent challenges that still call into question our most sacred aspirations as a country, we cannot afford shallow callous divisiveness in our public debate.
author: Cory Booker

quote: Give your child quality time. If you're going to be with him for two hours, then disconnect from absolutely everything. Look at him in the eyes - get to know your baby. Sitting there as you watch TV is not quality time to me.
author: Sandra Echeverria

quote: The reason that fish form schools, birds form flocks, and bees form swarms is that they are smarter together than they would be apart. They don't take a vote; they don't take a poll: they form a system. They are all interactive and make a decision together in real time.
author: Louis B. Rosenberg

quote: On the whole, human beings want to be good, but not too good, and not quite all the time.
author: George Orwell

quote: The greatest part of a writer's time is spent in reading in order to write. A man will turn over half a library to make a book.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: For the first time in human evolution, the individual life is long enough, and the cultural transformation swift enough, that the individual mind is now a constituent player in the global transformation of human culture.
author: William Irwin Thompson

quote: The economy of human time is the next advantage of machinery in manufactures.
author: Charles Babbage

quote: Your greatest asset is your earning ability. Your greatest resource is your time.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: If I hold back, I'm no good. I'm no good. I'd rather be good sometimes, than holding back all the time.
author: Janis Joplin

quote: I am having a good time doing nothing.
author: Phylicia Rashad

quote: Time passes, and little by little everything that we have spoken in falsehood becomes true.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: The characters I've played have been mostly violent, and I'm so far from being violent or aggressive. I spend a lot of time watching 'Fireman Sam' with my three-year-old son Louis.
author: Tom Hardy

quote: The seed is a household object but at the same time it is a revolutionary symbol.
author: Ai Weiwei

quote: Jesus did not spend a great deal of time discoursing about the trinity or original sin or the incarnation, which have preoccupied later Christians. He went around doing good and being compassionate.
author: Karen Armstrong

quote: Standing at my door, I heard the discharge of a gun, and in four or five seconds of time, after the discharge, the small shot came rattling about me, one or two of which struck the house; which plainly demonstrates that the velocity of sound is greater than that of a cannon bullet.
author: Benjamin Banneker

quote: The best things that capture your imagination are ones you hadn't thought of before and that aren't talked about in the news all the time.
author: Steve Wozniak

quote: The time making money should be greater than the time that you are spending money.
author: Sophia Amoruso

quote: There's something magical about spending a Sunday night watching real people at a deli, then watching fake people pretending to be real on TV, then engaging in (arguably) false interaction with (arguably) real people on the Internet. Never at any prior point in time has this been possible.
author: Diablo Cody

quote: If you don't have the time to read, you don't have the time or the tools to write.
author: Stephen King

quote: I'm a strong believer that you can build great companies in time of both greed and fear. But you have to be paying attention and operating under the right assumptions. You don't have to believe history repeats itself, but you should accept that history rhymes.
author: Brad Feld

quote: I must uphold my ideals, for perhaps the time will come when I shall be able to carry them out.
author: Anne Frank

quote: We have not the time to take our time.
author: Eugene Ionesco

quote: Send out a cheerful, positive greeting, and most of the time you will get back a cheerful, positive greeting. It's also true that if you send out a negative greeting, you will, in most cases, get back a negative greeting.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: We entered Gettysburg in the afternoon, just in time to meet the enemy entering the town, and in good season to drive him back before his getting a foothold.
author: John Buford

quote: Time does not change us. It just unfolds us.
author: Max Frisch

quote: Time is the substance from which I am made. Time is a river which carries me along, but I am the river; it is a tiger that devours me, but I am the tiger; it is a fire that consumes me, but I am the fire.
author: Jorge Luis Borges

quote: Truth is the daughter of time, not of authority.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: Education is an admirable thing, but it is well to remember from time to time that nothing that is worth knowing can be taught.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: The great thing about the Wilburys was that none of us had to take the heat by ourselves. I was just a member of the band. Nobody felt like he was above anybody else. We had such a good time.
author: Tom Petty

quote: The first time I tried to write was when I was 14, after I got an electric guitar. I put a song together, and it wasn't that bad! The writing came natural to me.
author: Tom Petty

quote: It's hard to say how certain stories just punch us in the heart and the brain at the same time at the end. I suppose that's what we're all looking for. But each story has its own valence, its own way of saying goodbye to you.
author: T. C. Boyle

quote: There are moments of life that we never forget, which brighten and brighten as time steals away.
author: James Gates Percival

quote: His talent was as natural as the pattern that was made by the dust on a butterfly's wings. At one time he understood it no more than the butterfly did and he did not know when it was brushed or marred.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: I've spent a long time giving people the benefit of the doubt, and I'm tired of it.
author: James McAvoy

quote: Punctuality is the virtue of the bored.
author: Evelyn Waugh

quote: And time for reflection with colleagues is for me a lifesaver it is not just a nice thing to do if you have the time. It is the only way you can survive.
author: Margaret J. Wheatley

quote: I have yet to meet anyone quite so stubborn as myself and animated by this overpowering passion that leaves me no time for thought or anything else. I have, in fact, no interest in life outside racing cars.
author: Enzo Ferrari

quote: The loss of a friend is like that of a limb; time may heal the anguish of the wound, but the loss cannot be repaired.
author: Robert Southey

quote: The nose of a mob is its imagination. By this, at any time, it can be quietly led.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: There'd never been a more advantageous time to be a criminal in America than during the 13 years of Prohibition. At a stroke, the American government closed down the fifth largest industry in the United States - alcohol production - and just handed it to criminals - a pretty remarkable thing to do.
author: Bill Bryson

quote: It is the hour to rend thy chains, the blossom time of souls.
author: Katharine Lee Bates

quote: We all know we have a finite period of time. I just feel if I'm going to be alive, I want to be challenged - to be as immortal as possible. The path to that isn't an easy way, but it's a rewarding way.
author: Frank Ocean

quote: We young Filipinos are trying to make over a nation and must not halt in our march, but from time to time turn our gaze upon our elders. We shall wish to read in their countenances approval of our actions.
author: Jose Rizal

quote: When I sing, I feel like when you're first in love. It's more than sex. It's that point two people can get to they call love, when you really touch someone for the first time, but it's gigantic, multiplied by the whole audience. I feel chills.
author: Janis Joplin

quote: Insecurity is a waste of time.
author: Diane von Furstenberg

quote: People come into your lives who you have a good time with, and time goes by and you still have a good time with them and you do stupid stuff with them. To me, that's life.
author: Danny DeVito

quote: Consciously or not, we are all on a quest for answers, trying to learn the lessons of life. We grapple with fear and guilt. We search for meaning, love, and power. We try to understand fear, loss, and time. We seek to discover who we are and how we can become truly happy.
author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quote: We look at life from the back side of the tapestry. And most of the time, what we see is loose threads, tangled knots and the like. But occasionally, God's light shines through the tapestry, and we get a glimpse of the larger design with God weaving together the darks and lights of existence.
author: John Piper

quote: I think getting married was a mistake along the way, but at the same time I wouldn't have the wonderful children I have if I didn't get married.
author: Hugh Hefner

quote: I'm not an idealist. I know we're not going to be living in a world that's peace and love all the time. But we can live in a world where we kill each other a lot less.
author: Michael Franti

quote: Jerry Ford is so dumb he can't fart and chew gum at the same time.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: Time is key to building your financial security.
author: Suze Orman

quote: When you face unexpected events, you have to try to overcome those problems, but at the same time, you have to continue working according to the plan that you defined since the beginning. So that's what we have tried to do - not to avoid the urgent responses but to continue the route that we had defined.
author: Laura Chinchilla

quote: Don't let fear rule your life. Live one day at a time, and never be afraid.
author: Tammy Faye Bakker

quote: Beer. It always seems like such a good idea at the time, doesn't it? What's worse is beer seems like an even better idea after you've had some beer.
author: Steven Hall

quote: I enjoy my fun time and everything like that but I love what I do.
author: Christina Milian

quote: I think the power of persuasion would be the greatest superpower of all time.
author: Jenny Mollen

quote: When you see things upside down, the ego can be extraordinarily funny; it's absurd. But it's tragic at the same time.
author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

quote: There are whole months at a time when my head is so full of ideas that I wake in the middle of the night and lie in the dark telling myself stories. There are also long, dark nights when I just know I'll never write another word: I'm finished, empty, a husk... Oh dear, yes, twitch, yawn, how I've suffered insomnia for my art.
author: Debi Gliori

quote: I was six months old at the time that I was taken, with my mother and father, from Sacramento, California, and placed in internment camps in the United States.
author: Robert Matsui

quote: If you spend any time with a man, you'll realize that we're all still little boys.
author: Paul Walker

quote: Nothing to me is unexpected. No disappointment is unexpected - whether it's movies or people or relationships. I'm always ready for the punch directly between the eyes. So I get hurt, but I never get hurt. Happens all the time.
author: Brian Grazer

quote: I like to think of myself as the host at a party, and, if everybody is having a good time, so much the better.
author: John Curran

quote: A lot of things have been thrown at me in life, and I've got through it all without a rule book, taking it one day at a time.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: I've been called a recluse. There's definitely truth in that. I like to spend time alone.
author: Kendrick Lamar

quote: Time is an illusion. Time only exists when we think about the past and the future. Time doesn't exist in the present here and now.
author: Marina Abramovic

quote: There's no good way to waste your time. Wasting time is just wasting time.
author: Helen Mirren

quote: I still get the jitters every time I start a new job! I love it - makes you feel alive.
author: Camille Guaty

quote: I used to tease Joe Louis by reminding him that I was the greatest of all time. But Joe Louis was the greatest heavyweight fighter ever.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Can't even see without my vintage Versace frames. I don't go nowhere without them on. I can't even live without them. Every time I throw them on, I see all the haters, and I see where the money at.
author: Quavo

quote: 'Good English' is whatever educated people talk so that what is good in one place or time would not be so in another.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: Everything we say signifies; everything counts, that we put out into the world. It impacts on kids, it impacts on the zeitgeist of the time.
author: Meryl Streep

quote: People of Berlin - people of the world - this is our moment. This is our time.
author: Barack Obama

quote: I practiced drawing all the time and became very interested in it. If I was at a meeting that wasn't getting anywhere - like the one where Carl Rogers came to Caltech to discuss with us whether Caltech should develop a psychology department - I would draw the other people.
author: Richard P. Feynman

quote: Swift speedy time, feathered with flying hours, Dissolves the beauty of the fairest brow.
author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

quote: You don't go around grieving all the time, but the grief is still there and always will be.
author: Nigella Lawson

quote: One of the most pervasive political visions of our time is the vision of liberals as compassionate and conservatives as less caring.
author: Thomas Sowell

quote: I play myself all the time, on camera and off. What else can I do?
author: Harry Dean Stanton

quote: My understanding of the creative process is simply that all cultures and all concerns meet at a certain point, the human point in which everything is related to one another. That has been my creative experience. I never know who's influencing me at any time.
author: Wole Soyinka

quote: After we were hit on September 11, 2001, we were in a state of national shock. Less than six weeks later, on October 26 2001, the U.S.A. Patriot Act was passed by a Congress that had little chance to debate it; many said that they scarcely had time to read it.
author: Naomi Wolf

quote: Time has been transformed, and we have changed; it has advanced and set us in motion; it has unveiled its face, inspiring us with bewilderment and exhilaration.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: We are time's subjects, and time bids be gone.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Tonight, tonight we've reached a milestone in our nation's march toward a more perfect union: the first time that a major party has nominated a woman for president. Standing here, standing here as my mother's daughter, and my daughter's mother, I'm so happy this day has come.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: On the one hand, there are individual actions such as throwing, pushing, touching, rubbing. It is these individual actions that give rise most of the time to abstraction from objects.
author: Jean Piaget

quote: I've always really just liked football, and I've always devoted a lot of time to it. When I was a kid, my friends would call me to go out with them, but I would stay home because I had practice the next day.
author: Lionel Messi

quote: Time brings all things to pass.
author: Aeschylus

quote: The real menace in dealing with a five-year-old is that in no time at all you begin to sound like a five-year-old.
author: Jean Kerr

quote: Conscious of not being able to separate myself from my time, I have decided to become part of it.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Time is bunk.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: It would take six months to get to Mars if you go there slowly, with optimal energy cost. Then it would take eighteen months for the planets to realign. Then it would take six months to get back, though I can see getting the travel time down to three months pretty quickly if America has the will.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Most people have a harder time letting themselves love than finding someone to love them.
author: Bill Russell

quote: It's time to commit to finding the answer, to search for life beyond Earth. Mankind has a deep need to explore, to learn, to know. We also happen to be sociable creatures. It is important for us to know if we are alone in the dark.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: Time makes heroes but dissolves celebrities.
author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: In times like these, it helps to recall that there have always been times like these.
author: Paul Harvey

quote: Time makes more converts than reason.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: Time is what prevents everything from happening at once.
author: John Archibald Wheeler

quote: Nothing puzzles me more than the time and space and yet nothing troubles me less.
author: Charles Lamb

quote: I want to go ahead of Father Time with a scythe of my own.
author: H. G. Wells

quote: Time goes, you say? Ah, no! alas, time stays, we go.
author: Henry Austin Dobson

quote: Now is the age of anxiety.
author: W. H. Auden

quote: Well-timed silence is the most commanding expression.
author: Mark Helprin

quote: Who makes quick use of the moment is a genius of prudence.
author: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quote: Eternity: a moment standing still for ever.
author: James Montgomery

quote: The time I kill is killing me.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: Day, n. A period of twenty-four hours, mostly misspent.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: The present time has one advantage over every other - it is our own.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: Time is a beautiful thing. It's like when you meet an old lover on the street six years later and they don't look so ugly anymore.
author: Sarah McLachlan

quote: All our sweetest hours fly fastest.
author: Virgil

quote: Time, whose tooth gnaws away everything else, is powerless against truth.
author: Thomas Huxley

quote: It is my feeling that Time ripens all things with Time all things are revealed Time is the father of truth.
author: Francois Rabelais

quote: We must go fast, because the race is against time.
author: Anna Held

quote: By the time we've made it, we've had it.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: The trouble with our times is that the future is not what it used to be.
author: Paul Valery

quote: Finding some quiet time in your life, I think, is hugely important.
author: Mariel Hemingway

quote: Both young children and old people have a lot of time on their hands. That's probably why they get along so well.
author: Jonathan Carroll

quote: I took some time out for life.
author: James L. Brooks

quote: Know how to live the time that is given you.
author: Dario Fo

quote: Time was God's first creation.
author: Walter Lang

quote: Each moment is perfect and heaven-sent, in that each moment holds the seeds for growth.
author: Suzan-Lori Parks

quote: The best way to fill time is to waste it.
author: Marguerite Duras

quote: Time is the school in which we learn, time is the fire in which we burn.
author: Delmore Schwartz

quote: Time has a way of demonstrating that the most stubborn are the most intelligent.
author: Yevgeny Yevtushenko

quote: Perfection is the child of time.
author: Joseph Hall

quote: Let him who would enjoy a good future waste none of his present.
author: Roger Babson

quote: Time and space - time to be alone, space to move about - these may well become the great scarcities of tomorrow.
author: Edwin Way Teale

quote: The time to hesitate is through.
author: Robby Krieger

quote: And when is there time to remember, to sift, to weigh, to estimate, to total?
author: Tillie Olsen

quote: Time is a dressmaker specializing in alterations.
author: Faith Baldwin

quote: My time is now.
author: John Turner

quote: A woman is like a tea bag - you can't tell how strong she is until you put her in hot water.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Because you are women, people will force their thinking on you, their boundaries on you. They will tell you how to dress, how to behave, who you can meet and where you can go. Don't live in the shadows of people's judgement. Make your own choices in the light of your own wisdom.
author: Amitabh Bachchan

quote: After women, flowers are the most lovely thing God has given the world.
author: Christian Dior

quote: Women are made to be loved, not understood.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: A woman should be like a single flower, not a whole bouquet.
author: Anna Held

quote: If you want something said, ask a man; if you want something done, ask a woman.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: If women ran the world we wouldn't have wars, just intense negotiations every 28 days.
author: Robin Williams

quote: The glory of justice and the majesty of law are created not just by the Constitution - nor by the courts - nor by the officers of the law - nor by the lawyers - but by the men and women who constitute our society - who are the protectors of the law as they are themselves protected by the law.
author: Robert Kennedy

quote: What I've never understood is why some women use plastic surgery to make themselves more attractive to men. The most beautiful woman is someone who's happy and is always smiling.
author: Irina Shayk

quote: Reputation is what men and women think of us character is what God and angels know of us.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: Women are the largest untapped reservoir of talent in the world.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: Women are nothing but machines for producing children.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: It was we, the people; not we, the white male citizens; nor yet we, the male citizens; but we, the whole people, who formed the Union. And we formed it, not to give the blessings of liberty, but to secure them; not to the half of ourselves and the half of our posterity, but to the whole people - women as well as men.
author: Susan B. Anthony

quote: The principle goal of education in the schools should be creating men and women who are capable of doing new things, not simply repeating what other generations have done.
author: Jean Piaget

quote: Being natural is incredibly empowering for women because it's just who you are. You're embracing all the beautiful things about you from your head to your toes. Because when you mask so much of your natural beauty, people don't get to see that.
author: Rozonda Thomas

quote: We are braver and wiser because they existed, those strong women and strong men... We are who we are because they were who they were. It's wise to know where you come from, who called your name.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Men, their rights, and nothing more; women, their rights, and nothing less.
author: Susan B. Anthony

quote: A miracle is really the only way to describe motherhood and giving birth. It's unbelievable how God has made us women and babies to endure and be able to do so much. A miracle, indeed. Such an incredible blessing.
author: Jennie Finch

quote: Let's be very clear: Strong men - men who are truly role models - don't need to put down women to make themselves feel powerful. People who are truly strong lift others up. People who are truly powerful bring others together.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: We hold these truths to be self-evident: that all men and women are created equal.
author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quote: No nation can rise to the height of glory unless your women are side by side with you.
author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quote: With over 3 million women battling breast cancer today, everywhere you turn there is a mother, daughter, sister, or friend who has been affected by breast cancer.
author: Betsey Johnson

quote: Men and women must be educated, in a great degree, by the opinions and manners of the society they live in.
author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quote: I think women are foolish to pretend they are equal to men they are far superior and always have been.
author: William Golding

quote: The American flag is an enduring symbol of liberty, democracy, and justice. It is fitting that the House act to protect it as we approach our nation's birthday, and as our men and women in uniform rally behind it in Iraq's battlefields.
author: Joe Barton

quote: Ah, women. They make the highs higher and the lows more frequent.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: I want to encourage women to embrace their own uniqueness. Because just like a rose is beautiful, so is a sunflower, so is a peony. I mean, all flowers are beautiful in their own way, and that's like women too.
author: Miranda Kerr

quote: There's nothing more superficial to do than to paint a beautiful woman. The most beautiful portraits in art were of ugly women. If you paint Brigitte Bardot, it's a disaster. Sunsets, you have to stay away from sunsets. You paint a sunset, you are in great danger.
author: Fernando Botero

quote: Yes, we become stronger when men and women, young and old, gay and straight, native-born and immigrant fight together to create the kind of country we all know we can become.
author: Bernie Sanders

quote: I think women should wear whatever makeup they want for themselves. Makeup should be fun.
author: Emma Stone

quote: You must make women count as much as men you must have an equal standard of morals and the only way to enforce that is through giving women political power so that you can get that equal moral standard registered in the laws of the country. It is the only way.
author: Emmeline Pankhurst

quote: God of peace, bring your peace to our violent world: peace in the hearts of all men and women and peace among the nations of the Earth.
author: Pope Benedict XVI

quote: I think God made a woman to be strong and not to be trampled under the feet of men. I've always felt this way because my mother was a very strong woman, without a husband.
author: Little Richard

quote: Women should never go without earrings. Passing on them is an opportunity missed.
author: Jennifer Lopez

quote: I don't know who invented high heels, but all women owe him a lot.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: It's not vanity to feel you have a right to be beautiful. Women are taught to feel we're not good enough, that we must live up to someone else's standards. But my aim is to cherish myself as I am.
author: Elle Macpherson

quote: I think it's important for little girls growing up, and young women, to have one in every walk of life. So from that point of view, I'm proud to be a role model!
author: Sally Ride

quote: It is our duty as men and women to proceed as though the limits of our abilities do not exist.
author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quote: A women who doesn't wear perfume has no future.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: There is a great stir about colored men getting their rights, but not a word about the colored women; and if colored men get their rights, and not colored women theirs, you see, the colored men will be masters over the women, and it will be just as bad as it was before.
author: Sojourner Truth

quote: Make women rational creatures, and free citizens, and they will quickly become good wives; - that is, if men do not neglect the duties of husbands and fathers.
author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quote: The prolonged slavery of women is the darkest page in human history.
author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quote: On campuses, where Liberal softies still rule with an iron fist, feminism is as safe as a city with no women drivers. That is the only thing I support about Saudi Arabia, by the way.
author: Milo Yiannopoulos

quote: Here's the thing, men have to also mature in how they see women, too. Because they need to understand that it's not just about how we look, it's about who we are. And I am going to tell you like this, 'If you can't love me with short hair, and you telling me I got to have long hair to be loved, guess what, I ain't the one for you.'
author: Jada Pinkett Smith

quote: There will never be a new world order until women are a part of it.
author: Alice Paul

quote: If you look back in history of the women who are most memorable and most stylish, they were never the followers of fashion. They were the ones who were unique in their style, breakers of the rules. They were authentic, genuine, original. They were not following the trends.
author: Nina Garcia

quote: Women ought to have representatives, instead of being arbitrarily governed without any direct share allowed them in the deliberations of government.
author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quote: We are volcanoes. When we women offer our experience as our truth, as human truth, all the maps change. There are new mountains.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quote: Women in particular need to keep an eye on their physical and mental health, because if we're scurrying to and from appointments and errands, we don't have a lot of time to take care of ourselves. We need to do a better job of putting ourselves higher on our own 'to do' list.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: Men and women in my lifetime have died fighting for the right to vote: people like James Chaney, Andrew Goodman and Michael Schwerner, who were murdered while registering black voters in Mississippi in 1964, and Viola Liuzzo, who was murdered by the Ku Klux Klan in 1965 during the Selma march for voting rights.
author: Jeff Greenfield

quote: No doubt exists that all women are crazy it's only a question of degree.
author: W. C. Fields

quote: Women are like cars: we all want a Ferrari, sometimes want a pickup truck, and end up with a station wagon.
author: Tim Allen

quote: 'Style Strategy' is about shopping smart, staying chic and making it all last. It's about showing women how to shop for value without compromising style.
author: Nina Garcia

quote: Feminism is a socialist, anti-family, political movement that encourages women to leave their husbands, kill their children, practice witchcraft, destroy capitalism and become lesbians.
author: Pat Robertson

quote: There's just something about vampires that's sexy. It's the same reason why women go for the bad boy - you want them but you shouldn't have them.
author: Nina Dobrev

quote: Kindness in women, not their beauteous looks, shall win my love.
author: Washington Irving

quote: Don't get caught up in the 'look' thing. Sometimes, we as men and women, the first thing that attracts us to someone is their physical appearance, and that's not always a good thing because what's good on the outside is not always good on the inside.
author: Keith Sweat

quote: The faces of most American women over thirty are relief maps of petulant and bewildered unhappiness.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: I do not wish women to have power over men but over themselves.
author: Mary Shelley

quote: It is downright mockery to talk to women of their enjoyment of the blessings of liberty while they are denied the use of the only means of securing them provided by this democratic-republican government: the ballot.
author: Susan B. Anthony

quote: I truly believe that women should be financially independent from their men. And let's face it, money gives men the power to run the show. It gives men the power to define value. They define what's sexy. And men define what's feminine. It's ridiculous.
author: Beyonce Knowles

quote: When God created man and woman, he was thinking, 'Who shall I give the power to, to give birth to the next human being?' And God chose woman. And this is the big evidence that women are powerful.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: Women, we might as well be dogs baying the moon as petitioners without the right to vote!
author: Susan B. Anthony

quote: Finally, let us understand that when we stand together, we will always win. When men and women stand together for justice, we win. When black, white and Hispanic people stand together for justice, we win.
author: Bernie Sanders

quote: I've always been attracted to women who are assertive and have confidence - qualities older women possess. They've been on the Earth a little longer. They're more seasoned. They don't play games. They know what they want, and they're not afraid to tell you.
author: Taye Diggs

quote: As it stands, motherhood is a sort of wilderness through which each woman hacks her way, part martyr, part pioneer; a turn of events from which some women derive feelings of heroism, while others experience a sense of exile from the world they knew.
author: Rachel Cusk

quote: My mother made me truly appreciate women.
author: Drake

quote: I'm a heroine addict. I need to have sex with women who have saved someone's life.
author: Mitch Hedberg

quote: Every company has two organizational structures: The formal one is written on the charts the other is the everyday relationship of the men and women in the organization.
author: Harold S. Geneen

quote: Women who stay true to themselves are always more interesting and beautiful to me: women like Frida Kahlo, Georgia O'Keeffe and Anna Magnani - women who have style, chic, allure and elegance. They didn't submit to any standard of beauty - they defined it.
author: Isabella Rossellini

quote: I am not handsome, but when women hear me play, they come crawling to my feet.
author: Niccolo Paganini

quote: If you don't love yourself, you can't love anybody else. And I think as women we really forget that.
author: Jennifer Lopez

quote: We need to change attitudes. We can only change attitudes by working together. Government will do its bit, but I want you all to do your bit, too. So speak out, stand up against violence against women and girls, and that's the way we can eradicate it.
author: Theresa May

quote: It should be remarked that, as the principle of liberty is better understood, and more nobly interpreted, a broader protest is made in behalf of women. As men become aware that few have had a fair chance, they are inclined to say that no women have had a fair chance.
author: Margaret Fuller

quote: I speak Spanish to God, Italian to women, French to men, and German to my horse.
author: Charles V

quote: Breast cancer alone kills some 458,000 people each year, according to the World Health Organization, mainly in low- and middle-income countries. It has got to be a priority to ensure that more women can access gene testing and lifesaving preventive treatment, whatever their means and background, wherever they live.
author: Angelina Jolie

quote: If it is right for men to fight for their freedom, and God knows what the human race would be like today if men had not, since time began, fought for their freedom, then it is right for women to fight for their freedom and the freedom of the children they bear.
author: Emmeline Pankhurst

quote: This position is untenable, and there can be no pause in the agitation for full political power and responsibility until these are granted to all the women of the nation.
author: Florence Kelley

quote: Girls have an unfair advantage over men: if they can't get what they want by being smart, they can get it by being dumb.
author: Yul Brynner

quote: There's a fundamental difference between how often men remember to say 'I love you' and how often women want to hear 'I love you.' For the most part, it's on the guy. He's not withholding it intentionally. It's just that we kind of miss the point sometimes, that even in the most nonchalant way, telling the person how you feel is important.
author: Brett Young

quote: Old-fashioned ways which no longer apply to changed conditions are a snare in which the feet of women have always become readily entangled.
author: Jane Addams

quote: I have made speeches urging women to adopt methods of rebellion such as have been adopted by men in every revolution.
author: Emmeline Pankhurst

quote: I remember being in Japan when Destiny's Child put out 'Independent Women,' and women there were saying how proud they were to have their own jobs, their own independent thinking, their own goals. It made me feel so good, and I realized that one of my responsibilities was to inspire women in a deeper way.
author: Beyonce Knowles

quote: I regard the rights of men and women equal. In Love's fair realm, husband and wife are king and queen, sceptered and crowned alike, and seated on the self-same throne.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: Nothing can be more absurd than the practice that prevails in our country of men and women not following the same pursuits with all their strengths and with one mind, for thus, the state instead of being whole is reduced to half.
author: Plato

quote: Women desire six things: They want their husbands to be brave, wise, rich, generous, obedient to wife, and lively in bed.
author: Geoffrey Chaucer

quote: I guess I was a bad boy... Yes, yes, I've had lots of women in my life.
author: Kirk Douglas

quote: That little man in black there, he says women can't have as much rights as men 'cause Christ wasn't a woman! Where did your Christ come from? Where did your Christ come from? From God and a woman! Man had nothing to do with Him.
author: Sojourner Truth

quote: Sexual harassment on the job is not a problem for virtuous women.
author: Phyllis Schlafly

quote: Women need real moments of solitude and self-reflection to balance out how much of ourselves we give away.
author: Barbara De Angelis

quote: If women want any rights more than they's got, why don't they just take them, and not be talking about it.
author: Sojourner Truth
