quote: Sometimes I think that the biggest difference between men and women is that more men need to seek out some terrible lurking thing in existence and hurl themselves upon it. Women know where it lives but they can let it alone.
author: Russell Hoban

quote: If women are supposed to be less rational and more emotional at the beginning of our menstrual cycle when the female hormone is at its lowest level, then why isn't it logical to say that, in those few days, women behave the most like the way men behave all month long?
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: If women believed in their husbands they would be a good deal happier and also a good deal more foolish.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: Men know they are sexual exiles. They wander the earth seeking satisfaction, craving and despising, never content. There is nothing in that anguished motion for women to envy.
author: Camille Paglia

quote: I want to make a policy statement. I am unabashedly in favor of women.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: Men, as well as women, are much oftener led by their hearts than by their understandings.
author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

quote: Were women meant to do everything - work and have babies?
author: Candice Bergen

quote: The most mediocre of males feels himself a demigod as compared with women.
author: Simone de Beauvoir

quote: The bomber will always get through. The only defense is in offense, which means that you have to kill more women and children more quickly that the enemy if you want to save yourselves.
author: Stanley Baldwin

quote: Many women do not recognize themselves as discriminated against no better proof could be found of the totality of their conditioning.
author: Kate Millett

quote: I wanted to be a journalist, I thought it was glamorous and that I'd meet beautiful women in the rain.
author: Bill Nighy

quote: A women's greatest asset is her beauty.
author: Alex Comfort

quote: Women are the victims of this patriarchal culture, but they are also its carriers. Let us keep in mind that every oppressive man was raised in the confines of his mother's home.
author: Shirin Ebadi

quote: I spent ninety percent of my money on wine, women and song and just wasted the other ten percent.
author: Ronnie Hawkins

quote: It's difficult for me to meet women because my crowd is much older. I know that for some of the young women I do meet, a relationship with me can be envisioned as a benefit to their career.
author: Michael Douglas

quote: Even now, after whatever gains feminism has made in involving fathers in the rearing of their children, I still think virtually all of us spend the most formative years of our lives very much in the presence of women.
author: Reynolds Price

quote: It is true that a fellow cannot ignore women - but he can think of them as he ought - as sisters, not as sparring partners.
author: Jim Elliot

quote: She knew what all smart women knew: Laughter made you live better and longer.
author: Gail Parent

quote: My Cape women are generally true to type - big hearted, motherly women who love the sea. My other characters, with the exception of the Portuguese, who I occasionally mention as Cape dwellers, are obviously drawn from the city types one sees in everyday life.
author: Joseph C. Lincoln

quote: As a human rights issue, the effort to end violence against women becomes a government's obligation, not just a good idea.
author: Charlotte Bunch

quote: The problem is that for women, the average time is just over 14 minutes... men are left with about 12 minutes during which time they need to think of something to do!
author: Phil McGraw

quote: Three things have been difficult to tame: the oceans, fools and women. We may soon be able to tame the oceans; fools and women will take a little longer.
author: Spiro T. Agnew

quote: I'm into women. I've always loved women.
author: David Gest

quote: Much of the demand for women in combat comes from female officers who are eager for medals and promotions.
author: Phyllis Schlafly

quote: I grew up in a house full of women: my mother, grandmother, three sisters, and two female cats. And I still have the buzz of their conversations in my head. As an adult, I have more female friends than male ones: I just love the way that women talk.
author: James Patterson

quote: The very fact that women now form about one-fifth of the employes in manufacture and commerce in this country has opened a vast field of industrial legislation directly affecting women as wage-earners.
author: Florence Kelley

quote: It was the best route to get folks to understand segregation fast. Civil rights and women's rights had a clear history. Making the transition to rights for people with disabilities became easier because we had the history of the other two.
author: Major Owens

quote: I've had women who move to the towns I'm living in, just pack up and move there, never even met 'em before, 'cause they heard I lived there.
author: GG Allin

quote: I think that over the years, whether they want to admit it or not, people have to admit that the women astronauts have performed just as well as the men astronauts.
author: Shannon Lucid

quote: I'll continue to work to ensure that safety and I am honored to have earned the endorsement of the men and women who provide public safety in our city.
author: Alan Autry

quote: If there's specific resistance to women making movies, I just choose to ignore that as an obstacle for two reasons: I can't change my gender, and I refuse to stop making movies.
author: Kathryn Bigelow

quote: Blind submission in women is considered a virtue, while submission to wrong is itself wrong, and resistance to wrong is virtue alike in women as in man.
author: Ernestine Rose

quote: I go out with white women. This makes a lot of people unhappy, mostly black women.
author: Dennis Rodman

quote: Wilt Chamberlain lied when he said he had 20,000 women.
author: Dennis Rodman

quote: How strange, when your father's wearing women's clothes and platform shoes, that a pair of loafers looks incredible.
author: Moon Unit Zappa

quote: But we have been to the Pole and we shall die like gentlemen. I regret only for the women we leave behind.
author: Robert Falcon Scott

quote: I don't think women should look like costumes. I don't think they should look like fashion victims. I think these (clothes) are for women that want to look sexy. They want to look smart.
author: Ralph Lauren

quote: When the men kill, it is up to us women to fight for the preservation of life.
author: Clara Zetkin

quote: What made women's labour particularly attractive to the capitalists was not only its lower price but also the greater submissiveness of women.
author: Clara Zetkin

quote: When a battle for suffrage is conducted, it should only be conducted according to socialist principles, and therefore with the demand of universal suffrage for women and men.
author: Clara Zetkin

quote: In 1986 we were trying to help women get in print, stay in print, and come to the attention of booksellers and libraries. At that time, books by men mystery writers were reviewed seven times as often as books by women.
author: Sara Paretsky

quote: More than 48 million men and women have served America well and faithfully in military uniform.
author: Steve Buyer

quote: And nothing embittered me, which is important, because I think ethnic people and women in this society can end up being embittered because of the lack of affirmative action, you know.
author: James Earl Jones

quote: Women - always in trouble with them, but can't live without them.
author: Ayrton Senna

quote: By and large, women in New Zealand are fortunate compared with some other countries, including many in our own region. But there is still progress to be made.
author: Jenny Shipley

quote: Black women sharing close ties with each other, politically or emotionally, are not the enemies of Black men.
author: Audre Lorde

quote: When women work together, it's a bond unlike any other.
author: Victoria Principal

quote: And I highly recommend for all the women in the world, even if they're 71, you can never take for granted that he loves you. It's always good to flirt with him. It's a great sport.
author: Salma Hayek

quote: I'd much rather be a woman than a man. Women can cry, they can wear cute clothes, and they're the first to be rescued off sinking ships.
author: Gilda Radner

quote: Over this August district work period, like many of my colleagues, I spent a lot of time with the men and women in uniform from my home State. The 196th Field Artillery Brigade just got back from a year in Afghanistan.
author: Zach Wamp

quote: Women have had the power of naming stolen from us.
author: Mary Daly

quote: Because society would rather we always wore a pretty face, women have been trained to cut off anger.
author: Nancy Friday

quote: I like women. I don't understand them, but I like them.
author: Sean Connery

quote: Childbearing is glorified in part because women die from it.
author: Andrea Dworkin

quote: Men and women are not born inconstant: they are made so by their early amorous experiences.
author: Andre Maurois

quote: It is always the same: women bedeck themselves with jewels and furs, and men with wit and quotations.
author: Maurice Chevalier

quote: There are women who take it to the wire. That's what they are looking for, the ultimate confrontation. They want a smack.
author: Sean Connery

quote: Women have been taught that, for us, the earth is flat, and that if we venture out, we will fall off the edge. Some of us have ventured out nevertheless, and so far we have not fallen off. It is my faith, my feminist faith, that we will not.
author: Andrea Dworkin

quote: In my books, women often solve the problem. Even if the woman is not the hero, she's a strong character. She does change the plot. She'll often rescue the male character from some situation.
author: Ken Follett

quote: At least 50 times. I've jumped off a building, jumped off a cliff in a car. I've been in bedrooms when women came in with knives and guns.
author: Dennis Rodman

quote: Men's need to dominate women may be based in their own sense of marginality or emptiness; we do not know its root, and men are making no effort to discover it.
author: Marilyn French

quote: Women are only children of a larger growth. A man of sense only trifles with them, plays with them, humours and flatters them, as he does with a sprightly and forward child; but he neither consults them about, nor trusts them with, serious matters.
author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

quote: However novel it may appear, I shall venture the assertion, that, until women assume the place in society which good sense and good feeling alike assign to them, human improvement must advance but feebly.
author: Frances Wright

quote: Behind all their personal vanity, women themselves always have an impersonal contempt for woman.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Stupid as a man, say the women: cowardly as a woman, say the men. Stupidity in a woman is unwomanly.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Silence is an ornament for women.
author: Sophocles

quote: Leave women to find their sphere.
author: Lucy Stone

quote: Tradition has made women cowardly.
author: Nance O'Neil

quote: If women have young children, they are one man away from welfare.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: We need to see men and women as equal partners, but it's hard to think of movies that do that. When I talk to people, they think of movies of forty-five years ago! Hepburn and Tracy!
author: Betty Friedan

quote: To a philosopher all news, as it is called, is gossip, and they who edit and read it are old women over their tea.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: In too many instances, the march to globalization has also meant the marginalization of women and girls. And that must change.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: One can find women who have never had one love affair, but it is rare indeed to find any who have had only one.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: There are few virtuous women who are not bored with their trade.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Women always excel men in that sort of wisdom which comes from experience. To be a woman is in itself a terrible experience.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: I think all women go through periods where we hate this about ourselves, we don't like that. It's great to get to a place where you dismiss anything you're worried about. I find flaws attractive. I find scars attractive.
author: Angelina Jolie

quote: If you ask me about my views on the environment, on women's rights, on gay rights, I am liberal. I don't have a problem with that at all. Some of my best friends are liberal.
author: Bernie Sanders

quote: I've yet to be on a campus where most women weren't worrying about some aspect of combining marriage, children, and a career. I've yet to find one where many men were worrying about the same thing.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: What has the women's movement learned from Geraldine Ferraro's candidacy for vice president? Never get married.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: Most women's magazines simply try to mold women into bigger and better consumers.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: Men and women belong to different species and communications between them is still in its infancy.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: Women in love are less ashamed than men. They have less to be ashamed of.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: I think feminists are unaware of the tremendous extent of the role of women in history.
author: Vivienne Westwood

quote: Good-humoured, unaffected girls, will not do for a man who has been used to sensible women. They are two distinct orders of being.
author: Jane Austen

quote: Women hate everything which strips off the tinsel of sentiment, and they are right, or it would rob them of their weapons.
author: Lord Byron

quote: There is a physical relationship with a woman that you don't have with anybody else, but that's not about love. Love is a spiritual thing.
author: Ziggy Marley

quote: On the whole, I think women wear too much and are to fussy. You can't see the person for all the clutter.
author: Julie Andrews

quote: I'm not denyin' the women are foolish. God Almighty made 'em to match the men.
author: George Eliot

quote: During the era when women were burning their bras - which, by the way, they never actually did - but when women were first becoming liberated, I was 23. And I met a woman who asked, 'Don't you feel bad because you're sort of acting like the stupid airhead blonde?' And I totally surprised myself. I said, 'Liberation can also come from the inside.'
author: Goldie Hawn

quote: It's incredibly unfair. You don't see a lot of 60-year-old women with 20-year-old men onscreen.
author: George Clooney

quote: The men and women of Afghanistan are building a nation that is free, and proud, and fighting terror - and America is honored to be their friend.
author: George W. Bush

quote: When anything goes, it's women who lose.
author: Camille Paglia

quote: Woman is the dominant sex. Men have to do all sorts of stuff to prove that they are worthy of woman's attention.
author: Camille Paglia

quote: To conclude that women are unfitted to the task of our historic society seems to me the equivalent of closing male eyes to female facts.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: The most virtuous women have something within them, something that is never chaste.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: Women are frightening. If you get to 41 as a man, you're quite battle-scarred.
author: Hugh Grant

quote: The No. 1 impediment to women succeeding in the workforce is now in the home.
author: Sheryl Sandberg

quote: The thing women have yet to learn is nobody gives you power. You just take it.
author: Roseanne Barr

quote: Most women put off entertaining until the kids are grown.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: Why is it men are permitted to be obsessed about their work, but women are only permitted to be obsessed about men?
author: Barbra Streisand

quote: A man who graduated high in his class at Yale Law School and made partnership in a top law firm would be celebrated. A man who invested wisely would be admired, but a woman who accomplishes this is treated with suspicion.
author: Barbra Streisand

quote: People don't want to see women doing things they don't think women should do.
author: Joan Jett

quote: I think that women just have a primeval instinct to make soup, which they will try to foist on anybody who looks like a likely candidate.
author: Dylan Moran

quote: All women's issues are to some degree men's issues and all men's issues are to some degree women's issues because when either sex wins unilaterally both sexes lose.
author: Warren Farrell

quote: Women love to be called cruel, even when they are kindest.
author: Samuel Richardson

quote: I think women get caught up too much in having a plan - 'I'm going to get married at this age I'm going to have a kid at this age' - and then they just try to find a guy who will fit into that picture. I don't want my life to be based on that.
author: Julia Stiles

quote: Men and women, women and men. It will never work.
author: Erica Jong

quote: Some women hold up dresses that are so ugly and they always say the same thing: 'This looks much better on.' On what? On fire?
author: Rita Rudner

quote: Like many other women, I could not understand why every man who changed a diaper has felt impelled, in recent years, to write a book about it.
author: Barbara Ehrenreich

quote: I try to write parts for women that are as complicated and interesting as women actually are.
author: Nora Ephron

quote: Balls are to men what purses are to women.
author: Sarah Jessica Parker

quote: I think that maybe if women and children were in charge we would get somewhere.
author: James Thurber

quote: When men reach their sixties and retire, they go to pieces. Women go right on cooking.
author: Gail Sheehy

quote: Let us leave pretty women to men devoid of imagination.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: I am not a sexy woman, I'm not beautiful, I'm not a sex kitten, I don't flirt with people, yet I've been tagged more of sex symbol than women who truly are and I that's solely because I don't reveal too much: people are curious.
author: Shirley Manson

quote: Men become much more attractive when they start looking older. But it doesn't do much for women, though we do have an advantage: make-up.
author: Bette Davis

quote: What is the most beautiful in virile men is something feminine what is most beautiful in feminine women is something masculine.
author: Susan Sontag

quote: It is easier for women to succeed in business, the arts, and politics in America than in Europe.
author: Hedy Lamarr

quote: Only men who are not interested in women are interested in women's clothes. Men who like women never notice what they wear.
author: Anatole France

quote: The struggles waged by nations are weak only when they lack support in the hearts of their women.
author: Jose Marti

quote: Lonely women destroy themselves lonely men threaten the world.
author: Victor LaValle

quote: Americans like fat books and thin women.
author: Russell Baker

quote: As to honor - you know - it's a very fine mediaeval inheritance which women never got hold of. It wasn't theirs.
author: Joseph Conrad

quote: Yes, it's a man's world, but that's all right because they're making a total mess of it. We're chipping away at their control, taking the parts we want. Some women think it's a difficult task, but it's not.
author: Cher

quote: What we women need to do, instead of worrying about what we don't have, is just love what we do have.
author: Cameron Diaz

quote: In life, single women are the most vulnerable adults. In movies, they are given imaginary power.
author: Elizabeth Wurtzel

quote: Women may not have it easy, but we are given a fairer chance to reach for the top.
author: Jessica Savitch

quote: Decisiveness is a characteristic of high-performing men and women. Almost any decision is better than no decision at all.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: This man is frank and earnest with women. In Fresno, he's Frank and in Chicago he's Ernest.
author: Henny Youngman

quote: Women often postpone their lives, thinking that if they're not with a partner then it doesn't really count. They're still searching for their prince, in a way. And as much as we don't discuss that, because it's too embarrassing and too sad, I think it really does exist.
author: Jane Campion

quote: All societies on the verge of death are masculine. A society can survive with only one man no society will survive a shortage of women.
author: Germaine Greer

quote: Women have very little idea of how much men hate them.
author: Germaine Greer

quote: You can't raise the standard of women's morals by raising their pay envelope. It lies deeper than that.
author: Billy Sunday

quote: I guess at the end of the day, all women like to be appreciated and treated with respect and kindness.
author: Sofia Vergara

quote: Women hear rhythm differently than men.
author: Elvis Costello

quote: I'll always prefer to play with women and hang out with women, and I'll always be a feminist.
author: Courtney Love

quote: Women today have more of an overview of their lives and how marriage is or is not a part of it.
author: Helen Reddy

quote: When a guy can make fun of you, thats attractive. Who knew that teasing could have so much power over women!
author: Rachel Bilson

quote: Women with money and women in power are two uncomfortable ideas in our society.
author: Candace Bushnell

quote: The upward course of a nation's history is due in the long run to the soundness of heart of its average men and women.
author: Queen Elizabeth II

quote: Because wherever I am today, I still owe it to God and I owe it to two men - the Honorable Elijah Muhammad and Malcolm X and of course, two very special women, my mother and my wife.
author: Louis Farrakhan

quote: Women have a predestination to suffering.
author: Bela Lugosi

quote: The power of the word in Morocco belonged to men and to the authorities. No one asked the point of view of poor people or women.
author: Tahar Ben Jelloun

quote: The whole tone of Church teaching in regard to women is, to the last degree, contemptuous and degrading.
author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quote: Sure, women sportswriters look when they're in the clubhouse. Read their stories. How else do you explain a capital letter in the middle of a word?
author: Bob Uecker

quote: Whether women are better than men I cannot say - but I can say they are certainly no worse.
author: Golda Meir

quote: Women's Lib? Oh, I'm afraid it doesn't interest me one bit. I've been so liberated it hurts.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: There is no development strategy more beneficial to society as a whole - women and men alike - than the one which involves women as central players.
author: Kofi Annan

quote: The Golden Girls certainly proved that there was a large audience for a show about older women.
author: Marlo Thomas

quote: I think women are excellent social critics.
author: Laurie Anderson

quote: But, alas! what poor Woman is ever taught that she should have a higher Design than to get her a Husband?
author: Mary Astell

quote: Most women are indulgent of themselves. This is a mistake. It should be only the reward of old age.
author: Anna Held

quote: I am truly free only when all human beings, men and women, are equally free. The freedom of other men, far from negating or limiting my freedom, is, on the contrary, its necessary premise and confirmation.
author: Mikhail Bakunin

quote: The most efficient water power in the world - women's tears.
author: Wilson Mizner

quote: Intimacies between women often go backwards, beginning in revelations and ending in small talk.
author: Elizabeth Bowen

quote: And I think women have come a very, very long way, but they have a long way to go.
author: Lara Flynn Boyle

quote: You're not working with models, you're working with real women who have, like, anatomy. Models do not have anatomy.
author: Isaac Mizrahi

quote: Today, the growing economic and social pressures in our country are putting millions of women, children and families at increased risk of abuse and neglect, especially when families are denied basic support services and economic opportunity.
author: Robert Casey

quote: I live in a house with four women. Just shut up and say, Yes, ma'am.
author: Tim McGraw

quote: My dream is to save women from nature.
author: Christian Dior

quote: Aren't women prudes if they don't and prostitutes if they do?
author: Kate Millett

quote: We are women. We are a subject people who have inherited an alien culture.
author: Kate Millett

quote: Women are the first to jump on what is fashionable.
author: Gavin DeGraw

quote: Years ago women of my size were considered royalty.
author: Camryn Manheim

quote: I will say that the idea of a woman being deceptive came from that original discussion with critics and reporters about if woman could do that kind of thing. Evelyn, herself, grew out of the discussions about how capable women are of deceit and lying and manipulation.
author: Neil LaBute

quote: Women priests. Great, great. Now there's priests of both sexes I don't listen to.
author: Bill Hicks

quote: I'm particularly fortunate to be in a position where I can bring my child to work and be able to get good child care. Not a lot of women have that.
author: Julia Louis-Dreyfus

quote: I'm surrounded by very powerful women and very progressive men.
author: Christie Hefner

quote: I have been a woman for fifty years, and I've never yet been able to discover precisely what it is I am.
author: Jean Giraudoux

quote: I always say God should have given women one extra decade at least, especially if you want a family. You're trying to pack a lot in.
author: Christine Baranski

quote: Women are just beginning to see that there's something about being a woman that's innately different from being a man. I love what I'm seeing take place and I know Julia has so much to offer.
author: Kenny Loggins

quote: But I think it would be irresponsible for me not to say what I really believe in my heart to be true - that there are some serious inequities that we face as women and that we can work to address these inequities.
author: Anita Hill

quote: They say that women talk too much. If you have worked in Congress you know that the filibuster was invented by men.
author: Clare Boothe Luce

quote: The women's movement completely changed attitudes all over the world in ways we'll never be able to count.
author: Holly Near

quote: In God, the characteristics of men and women that we admire in men and women are combined. That's been a traditional Catholic teaching that God is the combination of opposites.
author: Andrew Greeley

quote: Violent crime is a solved problem - all they have to do is repeal the laws that keep those intelligent, capable, and responsible men and women from arming themselves, and violent crime evaporates like dry ice on a hot summer day.
author: L. Neil Smith

quote: You women could make someone fall in love even with a lie.
author: Georg Buchner

quote: Women are clear-headed, they are more creative and for this reason, sometimes, also more fragile.
author: Emma Bonino

quote: My advantage as a woman and a human being has been in having a mother who believed strongly in women's education. She was an early undergraduate at Oxford, and her own mother was a doctor.
author: Antonia Fraser

quote: King Charles II liked women's company and well as making love to them.
author: Antonia Fraser

quote: If everybody in this town connected with politics had to leave town because of chasing women and drinking, you would have no government.
author: Barry Goldwater

quote: I don't love dolls. I love women. I love their bodies.
author: John Galliano

quote: Women are women, and hurray for that.
author: John Galliano

quote: While we enjoy the benefits of living in the greatest democracy in the world, we must be ever conscious of the fact that none of the achievements or freedoms enjoyed in America would be possible without the price that has been paid for by our servicemen and women.
author: Mark Kennedy

quote: I could only try to comfort the women that I came face-to-face with. I was really moved by how much they wanted to talk, how much they needed to be comforted, and how happy they were that we were there.
author: Connie Sellecca

quote: Susan B. Anthony formed the Equal Rights Association, refuted ideas that women were inferior to men, and fought for a woman's right to vote.
author: Louise Slaughter

quote: Just because I haven't yet had any project surgery, I'm not going to knock it, because I think women have the right to do whatever they want to their bodies that make them feel good about themselves.
author: Susan Sarandon

quote: A homely face and no figure have aided many women heavenward.
author: Minna Antrim

quote: The young women in my classes are feisty and clever and believe, often with the passion of youthful optimism, that feminism is a battle already won. I worry for them - and for my daughters, too.
author: Louise Brown

quote: Women have this obsession with shoes.
author: Alexandra Paul

quote: And as a character, what I found very inspiring about playing Dharma, especially at that time, is that the women on television were more neurotic than they were free. And I thought, this is a rare bird and this is unique on television and I think it's really refreshing.
author: Jenna Elfman

quote: Southern women often marry a man knowing that he is the father of many little slaves. They do not trouble themselves about it.
author: Harriet Ann Jacobs

quote: Women are incredible in groups together. Terrifying. Men have nothing on them.
author: Michael Hutchence

quote: Disguise our bondage as we will, 'Tis woman, woman, rules us still.
author: Thomas Moore

quote: The appalling thing is the degree of charity women are capable of. You see it all the time... love lavished on absolute fools. Love's a charity ward, you know.
author: Lawrence Durrell

quote: I try to never lose sight of what a special time it is to be a women's basketball player.
author: Sue Wicks

quote: When women are encouraged to be competitive, too many of them become disagreeable.
author: Benjamin Spock

quote: Women like myself, CEOs, can pave the way for more women to get to the top.
author: Andrea Jung

quote: First at the outset, let me commend the great men and women of the United States Coast Guard for what they do.
author: Vito Fossella

quote: All issues are women's issues - and there are several that are just women's business.
author: Eddie Bernice Johnson

quote: She belongs to a race of delightful women, who never do any harm, whom everybody calls good, and who are very severe on those who do not pretend to be good.
author: Gilbert Parker

quote: Women need space and silence. We too quickly give away our energy. There's something about holding that richness.
author: Natalie Goldberg

quote: The connections between and among women are the most feared, the most problematic, and the most potentially transforming force on the planet.
author: Adrienne Rich

quote: A lot of women say they love being pregnant, but I wasn't such a big fan.
author: Marion Jones

quote: It is little men know of women their smiles and their tears alike are seldom what they seem.
author: Amelia Barr

quote: In love, women are professionals, men are amateurs.
author: Francois Truffaut

quote: These impossible women! How they do get around us! The poet was right: Can't live with them, or without them.
author: Aristophanes

quote: Women like to sit down with trouble - as if it were knitting.
author: Ellen Glasgow

quote: Women are one of the Almighty's enigmas to prove to men that He knows more than they do.
author: Ellen Glasgow

quote: The only people you can really share certain things with in secret are your girlfriends.
author: Shirley Knight

quote: It is true that they paid much more attention to the trade unions because the trade unions were after all speaking for the rights and conditions of working men and women in their employment.
author: Barbara Castle

quote: What bugs me is that movies don't reflect how interesting and vibrant women are. We don't treasure women as they get older.
author: Jill Clayburgh

quote: I like my women to be feminine, not sliding into tackles and covered in mud.
author: Brian Clough

quote: Sex hasn't been the same since women started enjoying it.
author: Lewis Grizzard

quote: Were there no women, men might live like gods.
author: Thomas Dekker

quote: Nature makes woman to be won and men to win.
author: George William Curtis

quote: The test of civilization is its estimate of women.
author: George William Curtis

quote: It's hard for a man to live with a successful woman - they seem to resent you so much. Very few men are generous enough to accept success in their women.
author: Shirley Bassey

quote: Women are repeatedly accused of taking things personally. I cannot see any other honest way of taking them.
author: Marya Mannes

quote: The men resent a woman getting any honour in what they consider is essentially their field. Men painters mostly despise women painters. So I have decided to stop squirming, to throw any honour in with Canada and women.
author: Emily Carr

quote: No country in Europe has a larger proportion of men and women of immigrant descent, mainly from the African continent and mainly Muslim: an estimated six to seven million of them, or more than 10% of the population.
author: Timothy Garton Ash

quote: It was trying to break down the stereotypes and it was the kind of thing where, for the first time, women were on a par and not seen as just objects. Though girls were objectified still.
author: Siouxsie Sioux

quote: We women must listen to our inner voice. It is easier for women to do this as they are not afraid to say what they feel.
author: Indra Devi

quote: Yes, it is worse than thrown away, because every fair minded man must admit that the expenditure of this sum of money in the county for intoxicating liquor creates lawlessness, makes criminals, wrecks homes and brings trouble to innocent women and children.
author: Thomas Jordan Jarvis

quote: Ironically, women who acquire power are more likely to be criticized for it than are the men who have always had it.
author: Carolyn Gold Heilbrun

quote: Until Eve arrived, this was a man's world.
author: Richard Armour

quote: With my early work I got eviscerated by my male professors, and so you learned to disguise your impulses, as many women have done. And that's definitely changed.
author: Judy Chicago

quote: It is incumbent upon us to respond to the unique needs of military women and ensure they receive proper care during the first year following childbirth.
author: Susan Collins

quote: Ask any woman and she'll tell you: health care for women is more expensive than it is for men. In fact, during their reproductive years, women spend 68% more on health care than men do.
author: Rod Blagojevich

quote: There were some tragic cases of women whose love was abused, who for a certain time procured important documents or information, not knowing who for, what service they worked for, and for a variety reasons got jailed, were tried and sentenced.
author: Markus Wolf

quote: The one thing women love more than money is power.
author: D. L. Hughley

quote: Under-representation of women and other inequality among researchers is a problem that will not solve itself as women acquire competence.
author: Tarja Halonen

quote: And I spoke out on women's rights, like equal pay for equal work.
author: Karen Morley

quote: Like most women, I hate when a guy tries to pick me up by saying, You are the hottest girl I've ever seen. It's totally unrealistic. There are beautiful women everywhere.
author: Karen McDougal

quote: I feel like I'm a very good role model for women.
author: Blu Cantrell

quote: There are no ugly women, only lazy ones.
author: Helena Rubinstein

quote: I don't think a powerful man would be interesting unless he'd be nice, attractive, with or without the power. Men are interested in powerful men. Women are interested in terrific men!
author: Dorothy Stratten

quote: Women want love to be a novel, men a short story.
author: Daphne du Maurier

quote: Women are the sustaining force of any society - they think of the children and the next generation's chances.
author: Margo MacDonald

quote: Black women as a group have never been fools. We couldn't afford to be.
author: Barbara Smith

quote: Women have the right to say: this is surface, this falsifies reality, this degrades.
author: Tillie Olsen

quote: Wit in women is apt to have bad consequences; like a sword without a scabbard, it wounds the wearer and provokes assailants.
author: Elizabeth Montagu

quote: I would love to have seen a male-female relationship that had nothing to do with falling in love, I'd love to prove, even on TV - even if it's not true! - that men and women can be friends without any kind of involvement.
author: Nana Visitor

quote: Women were freed from positive duties when they could not perform them, but not when they could.
author: Henrietta Szold

quote: Men and women want to do a good job, and if they are provided the proper environment, they will do so.
author: William Reddington Hewlett

quote: Part of the $10 million I spent on gambling, part on booze and part on women. The rest I spent foolishly.
author: George Raft

quote: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.
author: St. Jerome

quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: My life motto is 'Do my best, so that I can't blame myself for anything.'
author: Magdalena Neuner

quote: Ultimately, leadership is not about glorious crowning acts. It's about keeping your team focused on a goal and motivated to do their best to achieve it, especially when the stakes are high and the consequences really matter. It is about laying the groundwork for others' success, and then standing back and letting them shine.
author: Chris Hadfield

quote: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.
author: Joyce Brothers

quote: She's always there for me when I need her She's my best friend she's just my everything.
author: Ashley Olsen

quote: Things are never quite as scary when you've got a best friend.
author: Bill Watterson

quote: Heavy hearts, like heavy clouds in the sky, are best relieved by the letting of a little water.
author: Christopher Morley

quote: It's not that diamonds are a girl's best friend, but it's your best friends who are your diamonds. It's your best friends who are supremely resilient, made under pressure and of astonishing value. They're everlasting; they can cut glass if they need to.
author: Gina Barreca

quote: Technology can be our best friend, and technology can also be the biggest party pooper of our lives. It interrupts our own story, interrupts our ability to have a thought or a daydream, to imagine something wonderful, because we're too busy bridging the walk from the cafeteria back to the office on the cell phone.
author: Steven Spielberg

quote: One of the best ways to make yourself happy in the present is to recall happy times from the past. Photos are a great memory-prompt, and because we tend to take photos of happy occasions, they weight our memories to the good.
author: Gretchen Rubin

quote: Friends are the best to turn to when you're having a rough day.
author: Justin Bieber

quote: I follow three rules: Do the right thing, do the best you can, and always show people you care.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: Some of the best lessons we ever learn are learned from past mistakes. The error of the past is the wisdom and success of the future.
author: Dale Turner

quote: I'm selfish, impatient, and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I'm out of control, and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Speak when you are angry - and you'll make the best speech you'll ever regret.
author: Laurence J. Peter

quote: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.
author: Epictetus

quote: My best friend is the man who in wishing me well wishes it for my sake.
author: Aristotle

quote: The best part about being alone is that you really don't have to answer to anybody. You do what you want.
author: Justin Timberlake

quote: When everything is lonely I can be my best friend.
author: Conor Oberst

quote: The best education I have ever received was through travel.
author: Lisa Ling

quote: Our flag honors those who have fought to protect it, and is a reminder of the sacrifice of our nation's founders and heroes. As the ultimate icon of America's storied history, the Stars and Stripes represents the very best of this nation.
author: Joe Barton

quote: I'm not in the best shape, but I want to prove to myself I can do something that seems insurmountable and inspire others by showing them no matter where they are in their fitness goals, they can do it, too.
author: Ruben Studdard

quote: In any moment of decision, the best thing you can do is the right thing, the next best thing is the wrong thing, and the worst thing you can do is nothing.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Autumn wins you best by this its mute appeal to sympathy for its decay.
author: Robert Browning

quote: My mama always used to tell me: 'If you can't find somethin' to live for, you best find somethin' to die for.'
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: In times of great stress or adversity, it's always best to keep busy, to plow your anger and your energy into something positive.
author: Lee Iacocca

quote: Outside of a dog, a book is a man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: I look my best when I'm totally free, on holiday, walking on the beach.
author: Rosamund Pike

quote: Let go of yesterday. Let today be a new beginning and be the best that you can, and you'll get to where God wants you to be.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: I'm just myself. That's the best way to put it.
author: Post Malone

quote: 'Thank you' is the best prayer that anyone could say. I say that one a lot. Thank you expresses extreme gratitude, humility, understanding.
author: Alice Walker

quote: Silence is true wisdom's best reply.
author: Euripides

quote: I'm doing my best to raise my son and give him a nurturing, loving, and caring environment so he can grow up and be the best version of himself.
author: Miranda Kerr

quote: At his best, man is the noblest of all animals; separated from law and justice he is the worst.
author: Aristotle

quote: I am as bad as the worst, but, thank God, I am as good as the best.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: The human body is the best picture of the human soul.
author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quote: I do the very best I know how - the very best I can and I mean to keep on doing so until the end.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Battle is the most magnificent competition in which a human being can indulge. It brings out all that is best it removes all that is base. All men are afraid in battle. The coward is the one who lets his fear overcome his sense of duty. Duty is the essence of manhood.
author: George S. Patton

quote: I'm just thankful for everything, all the blessings in my life, trying to stay that way. I think that's the best way to start your day and finish your day. It keeps everything in perspective.
author: Tim Tebow

quote: I see myself as the best footballer in the world. If you don't believe you are the best, then you will never achieve all that you are capable of.
author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quote: Always Do Your Best. Your best is going to change from moment to moment; it will be different when you are healthy as opposed to sick. Under any circumstance, simply do your best, and you will avoid self-judgment, self-abuse and regret.
author: Don Miguel Ruiz

quote: Social media is something of a double-edged sword. At its best, social media offers unprecedented opportunities for marginalized people to speak and bring much needed attention to the issues they face. At its worst, social media also offers 'everyone' an unprecedented opportunity to share in collective outrage without reflection.
author: Roxane Gay

quote: The best way to cheer yourself up is to try to cheer somebody else up.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Don't lower your expectations to meet your performance. Raise your level of performance to meet your expectations. Expect the best of yourself, and then do what is necessary to make it a reality.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: Honesty is the best policy.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: My sister and I truly are best friends.
author: Solange Knowles

quote: My cell phone is my best friend. It's my lifeline to the outside world.
author: Carrie Underwood

quote: One's philosophy is not best expressed in words it is expressed in the choices one makes... and the choices we make are ultimately our responsibility.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Gorgeous hair is the best revenge.
author: Ivana Trump

quote: Just find what works for you, what style suits you best, and just be confident enough to rock it.
author: Odell Beckham, Jr.

quote: Walking is the best possible exercise. Habituate yourself to walk very far.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Laughter is not at all a bad beginning for a friendship, and it is far the best ending for one.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Walking is man's best medicine.
author: Hippocrates

quote: I believe that in life, you have to give things your best shot, do your best. You have to focus on what needs to be done, do the right thing, not the popular thing.
author: David Cameron

quote: Having lots of siblings is like having built-in best friends.
author: Kim Kardashian

quote: Memories are the best things in life, I think.
author: Romy Schneider

quote: The best career advice I've gotten is to stay focused, keep moving forward.
author: Tyga

quote: Success is peace of mind which is a direct result of self-satisfaction in knowing you did your best to become the best you are capable of becoming.
author: John Wooden

quote: I think that's the single best piece of advice: constantly think about how you could be doing things better and questioning yourself.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Sports teaches you to understand the meaning of a team. You need to be able to work with everybody you don't have to be their best friend. You can experience the fun of competition and driving toward a common goal without pushing to bond in some major way with each individual on a project.
author: Kathleen Kennedy

quote: I always believe that to be the best, you have to smell like the best, dress like the best, act like the best. When you throw your trash in the garbage can, it has to be better than anybody else who ever threw trash in the garbage can.
author: Lil Wayne

quote: If you want to do really important things in life and big things in life, you can't do anything by yourself. And your best teams are your friends and your siblings.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: Solitude is creativity's best friend, and solitude is refreshment for our souls.
author: Naomi Judd

quote: The best cure for the body is a quiet mind.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: The best things in life are often waiting for you at the exit ramp of your comfort zone.
author: Karen Salmansohn

quote: You don't fight racism with racism, the best way to fight racism is with solidarity.
author: Bobby Seale

quote: Like love, breakfast is best when made at home.
author: Gina Barreca

quote: Chilling out on the bed in your hotel room watching television, while wearing your own pajamas, is sometimes the best part of a vacation.
author: Laura Marano

quote: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: To be nobody but yourself in a world which is doing its best, night and day, to make you everybody else - means to fight the hardest battle which any human being can fight; and never stop fighting.
author: e. e. cummings

quote: Among the natural rights of the colonists are these: First a right to life, secondly to liberty, and thirdly to property; together with the right to defend them in the best manner they can.
author: Samuel Adams

quote: The best thing is to look natural, but it takes makeup to look natural.
author: Calvin Klein

quote: A problem is a chance for you to do your best.
author: Duke Ellington

quote: The best advice I ever got was that knowledge is power and to keep reading.
author: David Bailey

quote: A woman knows by intuition, or instinct, what is best for herself.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: I think it's brought the world a lot closer together, and will continue to do that. There are downsides to everything; there are unintended consequences to everything. The most corrosive piece of technology that I've ever seen is called television - but then, again, television, at its best, is magnificent.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: One of the best pieces of advice I ever got was from a horse master. He told me to go slow to go fast. I think that applies to everything in life. We live as though there aren't enough hours in the day but if we do each thing calmly and carefully we will get it done quicker and with much less stress.
author: Viggo Mortensen

quote: The best road to progress is freedom's road.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: To wake up to the sound of my son saying 'Mama, mama!' It's the best sound ever.
author: Miranda Kerr

quote: Modeling is the best because you have to look hot, which comes easy to me, you know. I'm blessed with that.
author: Ashton Kutcher

quote: It is no use saying, 'We are doing our best.' You have got to succeed in doing what is necessary.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The best revenge is to live on and prove yourself.
author: Eddie Vedder

quote: The best customer service is if the customer doesn't need to call you, doesn't need to talk to you. It just works.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: 'Chef' doesn't mean that you're the best cook, it simply means 'boss.'
author: Tom Colicchio

quote: Good manners will open doors that the best education cannot.
author: Clarence Thomas

quote: Life is an unfoldment, and the further we travel the more truth we can comprehend. To understand the things that are at our door is the best preparation for understanding those that lie beyond.
author: Hypatia

quote: I look my best when I take my helmet off after a long motorcycle ride. I have a glow and a bit of helmet hair.
author: Eric Bana

quote: Employees are a company's greatest asset - they're your competitive advantage. You want to attract and retain the best; provide them with encouragement, stimulus, and make them feel that they are an integral part of the company's mission.
author: Anne M. Mulcahy

quote: Focused. I'm a hustler. And my hustle is trying to figure out the best ways to do what I like without having to do much else.
author: Mos Def

quote: A man's friendships are one of the best measures of his worth.
author: Charles Darwin

quote: Old wood best to burn, old wine to drink, old friends to trust, and old authors to read.
author: Athenaeus

quote: The ideal man bears the accidents of life with dignity and grace, making the best of circumstances.
author: Aristotle

quote: There are some things you learn best in calm, and some in storm.
author: Willa Cather

quote: The best fashion show is definitely on the street. Always has been, and always will be.
author: Bill Cunningham

quote: As a father, you want the best for your son, quite obviously. You want to create the best memories for your son.
author: Bill Goldberg

quote: You try to do the best with what you've got and ignore everything else. That's why horses get blinders in horse racing: You look at the horse next to you, and you lose a step.
author: Jimmy Iovine

quote: This is the precept by which I have lived: Prepare for the worst expect the best and take what comes.
author: Hannah Arendt

quote: Stubborn and ardent clinging to one's opinion is the best proof of stupidity.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Education is the best friend. An educated person is respected everywhere. Education beats the beauty and the youth.
author: Chanakya

quote: Do right. Do your best. Treat others as you want to be treated.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: Old friends are best.
author: John Selden

quote: It's always best to ask for forgiveness if you feel that you made a mistake. And again, asking for forgiveness is not just saying the words 'I'm sorry'; it is also offering what you need to do.
author: Grace Poe

quote: It is not enough to do your best; you must know what to do, and then do your best.
author: W. Edwards Deming

quote: To give anything less than your best, is to sacrifice the gift.
author: Steve Prefontaine

quote: If our nation wants to reduce global warming, air pollution and energy instability, we should invest only in the best energy options. Nuclear energy isn't one of them.
author: Mark Z. Jacobson

quote: I find that it's best to take one step at a time and cross each bridge as they come to you.
author: Michael Stuhlbarg

quote: My husband and I always have fun together in everything we do. Some people call me crazy, but the reality is that I enjoy spending each second with him. He is not just my husband - he is my rock and my very best friend!
author: Joyce Giraud

quote: The best car safety device is a rear-view mirror with a cop in it.
author: Dudley Moore

quote: I can only control my own performance. If I do my best, then I can feel good at the end of the day.
author: Michael Phelps

quote: My brother is my best friend.
author: Erinn Smart

quote: I've been searching for ways to heal myself, and I've found that kindness is the best way.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: The best part is still ahead of me - I haven't experienced my 'good old days' yet.
author: Luther Vandross

quote: The monster was the best friend I ever had.
author: Boris Karloff

quote: To be successful in real estate, you must always and consistently put your clients' best interests first. When you do, your personal needs will be realized beyond your greatest expectations.
author: Anthony Hitt

quote: By making college unaffordable and student loans unbearable, we risk deterring our best and brightest from pursuing higher education and securing a good-paying job.
author: Mark Pocan

quote: By all these lovely tokens September days are here, With summer's best of weather And autumn's best of cheer.
author: Helen Hunt Jackson

quote: Love God; love others; do your best in all you do, even if you fall short!
author: Bethany Hamilton

quote: Overcome your barriers, intend the best, and be patient. You will enjoy more balance, more growth, more income, and more fun!
author: Jack Canfield

quote: I am my own muse, the subject I know best.
author: Frida Kahlo

quote: Someone said adversity builds character, but someone else said adversity reveals character. I'm pleasantly surprised with my resilience. I persevere, and not just blindly. I take the best, get rid of the rest, and move on, realizing that you can make a choice to take the good.
author: Brooke Shields

quote: A good character is the best tombstone. Those who loved you and were helped by you will remember you when forget-me-nots have withered. Carve your name on hearts, not on marble.
author: Charles Spurgeon

quote: The worst times can be the best if you think with positive energy.
author: Domenico Dolce

quote: My very best friend died in a car accident when I was 16 years old. That was the hardest blow emotionally that I have ever had to endure. Suddenly, you realize tomorrow might not come. Now I live by the motto, 'Today is what I have.'
author: Amber Heard

quote: When you do something best in life, you don't really want to give that up - and for me it's tennis.
author: Roger Federer

quote: I lead no party; I follow no leader. I have given the best part of my life to careful study of Islam, its law and polity, its culture, its history and its literature.
author: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: The ultimate victory in competition is derived from the inner satisfaction of knowing that you have done your best and that you have gotten the most out of what you had to give.
author: Howard Cosell

quote: Candy is childhood, the best and bright moments you wish could have lasted forever.
author: Dylan Lauren

quote: Globalization has changed us into a company that searches the world, not just to sell or to source, but to find intellectual capital - the world's best talents and greatest ideas.
author: Jack Welch

quote: The best way of removing negativity is to laugh and be joyous.
author: David Icke

quote: We feel very honored to have been offered the responsibility to host this great event, Berlin is a wonderful city that is developing at a tremendous rate, and this decision means that we can now prepare to welcome the world's best athletes to a fascinating place.
author: Otto Schily

quote: For everything bad, there's a million really exciting things, whether it's someone puts out a really great book, there's a new movie, there's a new detective, the sky is unbelievably golden, or you have the best cup of coffee you ever had in your life.
author: Patti Smith

quote: Success is peace of mind, which is a direct result of self-satisfaction in knowing you made the effort to become the best of which you are capable.
author: John Wooden

quote: Life is a lot like jazz... it's best when you improvise.
author: George Gershwin

quote: It's a funny thing about life; if you refuse to accept anything but the best, you very often get it.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: Wise and humane management of the patient is the best safeguard against infection.
author: Florence Nightingale

quote: One of the best paradoxes of leadership is a leader's need to be both stubborn and open-minded. A leader must insist on sticking to the vision and stay on course to the destination. But he must be open-minded during the process.
author: Simon Sinek

quote: The best weapon of a dictatorship is secrecy, but the best weapon of a democracy should be the weapon of openness.
author: Niels Bohr

quote: The best way to avoid falling prey to the opinions of others is to realize that other people's opinions are just that - opinions. Regardless of how great or terrible they think you are, that's only their opinion. Your true self-worth comes from within.
author: Travis Bradberry

quote: I'm doing my best to be mindful about how I'm living: to be kind and patient, and not to impose a bad mood on somebody else. Being mindful is as good a way to be spiritual as anything else.
author: Deirdre O'Kane

quote: I still believe that 'No Smoking' is one of my best performances.
author: John Abraham

quote: Win or lose, I believe in giving my best and that is what I always do.
author: Lin Dan

quote: Don't let the fear of the time it will take to accomplish something stand in the way of your doing it. The time will pass anyway we might just as well put that passing time to the best possible use.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: I want it said of me by those who knew me best, that I always plucked a thistle and planted a flower where I thought a flower would grow.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Being a mother and grandmother is the best of the best in my life. My grandchildren multiply the joy my daughters bring me.
author: Alexandra Stoddard

quote: Time is generally the best doctor.
author: Ovid

quote: Your best ideas, those eureka moments that turn the world upside down, seldom come when you're juggling emails, rushing to meet the 5 P.M. deadline or straining to make your voice heard in a high-stress meeting. They come when you're walking the dog, soaking in the bath or swinging in a hammock.
author: Carl Honore

quote: Our goal is to make the best devices in the world, not to be the biggest.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The making of friends who are real friends, is the best token we have of a man's success in life.
author: Edward Everett Hale

quote: Lay this unto your breast: Old friends, like old swords, still are trusted best.
author: John Webster

quote: The best thing I did was to choose the right heroes.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: I was raised to believe that excellence is the best deterrent to racism or sexism. And that's how I operate my life.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Competition is always a good thing. It forces us to do our best. A monopoly renders people complacent and satisfied with mediocrity.
author: Nancy Pearcey

quote: One of the best things that ever happened to me is that I'm a woman. That is the way all females should feel.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: The ladder of success is best climbed by stepping on the rungs of opportunity.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Beer, it's the best damn drink in the world.
author: Jack Nicholson

quote: For me the best thing about winning an award is when the people cheer for your win. When you can see that the people are really happy that you are winning something, that's the most reward thing in the world.
author: Busta Rhymes

quote: Honesty is the best policy - when there is money in it.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Guitar is the best form of self-expression I know. Everything else, and I'm just sort of tripping around, trying to figure my way through life.
author: Slash

quote: The roots of true achievement lie in the will to become the best that you can become.
author: Harold Taylor

quote: The one thing you've gotta do is that you need to always do the best you can do, no matter what the given situation, no matter what comes up against you. You do the best you can do, and you never give up. Never quit.
author: James Corden

quote: Badminton is not only about winning. What is important to me is about playing hard, doing my best and putting up a good show for the spectators.
author: Lin Dan

quote: Empowering the individual means empowering the nation. And empowerment is best served through rapid economic growth with rapid social change.
author: Atal Bihari Vajpayee

quote: Use what talents you possess the woods would be very silent if no birds sang there except those that sang best.
author: Henry Van Dyke

quote: The best way to get to know the place you are traveling in is to walk around... and the best way to walk around is with comfortable shoes! Grab your travel buddy and your running shoes and go explore!
author: Laura Marano

quote: I don't care whether people like me or dislike me. I'm not on earth to win a popularity contest. I'm here to be the best human being I possibly can be.
author: Tab Hunter

quote: The best protection any woman can have... is courage.
author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quote: If it's flipping hamburgers at McDonald's, be the best hamburger flipper in the world. Whatever it is you do you have to master your craft.
author: Snoop Dogg

quote: I'm going to use all my tools, my God-given ability, and make the best life I can with it.
author: LeBron James

quote: My father taught me not to overthink things, that nothing will ever be perfect, so just keep moving and do your best.
author: Scott Eastwood

quote: I was never a pretty girl, so I wasn't the one to get the boy. I used to cast myself as a good sport. Sometimes I wonder if I do that too much with roles I play, because if I'm absolutely truthful, I quite like being the best friend, or the supporting role, and actually I ought to gear-change and make myself the leading role.
author: Celia Imrie

quote: Perfect partners don't exist. Perfect conditions exist for a limited time in which partnerships express themselves best.
author: Wayne Rooney

quote: No universal selfishness can bring social good to all. Communism - the effort to give all men what they need and to ask of each the best they can contribute - this is the only way of human life.
author: W. E. B. Du Bois

quote: My mother thinks I am the best. And I was raised to always believe what my mother tells me.
author: Diego Maradona

quote: There are a lot of people who give you the message that maybe you are not good enough, and the best thing you can do for yourself is to block out all of that noise.
author: Rachel Platten

quote: I married my best friend. I was still in awe after more than four years of being around her at how smart and strong and loving and caring she was. And I really hoped that her choosing me and rejecting my advice to pursue her own career was a decision she would never regret.
author: William J. Clinton

quote: At the end of the day, my goal was to be the best hacker.
author: Kevin Mitnick

quote: I think we all have blocks between us and the best version of ourselves, whether it's shyness, insecurity, anxiety, whether it's a physical block, and the story of a person overcoming that block to their best self. It's truly inspiring because I think all of us are engaged in that every day.
author: Tom Hooper

quote: My best vacation is somewhere I could hide, somewhere warm and not a lot of people around.
author: Derek Jeter

quote: The best way to guarantee a loss is to quit.
author: Morgan Freeman

quote: You have to be confident in who you are and what you're doing. Of course, you try to evolve. I would never tell you, 'Today is the best I will ever be.' I'm always trying to be a better chef, a better dad, a better person.
author: Guy Fieri

quote: Falling in love is the best way to kill your heart because then it's not yours anymore. It's laid in a coffin, waiting to be cremated.
author: Ville Valo

quote: I think one great tip is that you should always love yourself. If you don't love yourself, take care of yourself, cater to yourself and that little inner voice, you will really not be very worthy of being with someone else, because you won't be the best version of you.
author: Kimora Lee Simmons

quote: Being fully present is the best guarantee for a bright future.
author: Guy Finley

quote: If you're thinking of coming to America, this is what it's like: you've got your Comfort Inn, you've got your Best Western, and you've got your Red Lobster where you eat. Everybody's very fat, everybody's very stupid and everybody's very rude - it's not a holiday programme, it's the truth.
author: Jeremy Clarkson

quote: The best doctor is the one you run to and can't find.
author: Denis Diderot

quote: Try and leave this world a little better than you found it, and when your turn comes to die, you can die happy in feeling that at any rate, you have not wasted your time but have done your best.
author: Robert Baden-Powell

quote: I never had a policy I have just tried to do my very best each and every day.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: You have to accept whatever comes and the only important thing is that you meet it with courage and with the best that you have to give.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Every kid has a toy that they believe is their best friend, that they believe communicates with them, and they imagine it being alive, their toy horse or car or whatever it is. Stop-motion is the only medium where we literally can make a toy come to life, an actual object.
author: Henry Selick

quote: Trust is not simply a matter of truthfulness, or even constancy. It is also a matter of amity and goodwill. We trust those who have our best interests at heart, and mistrust those who seem deaf to our concerns.
author: Gary Hamel

quote: We have the best government that money can buy.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Living with fear stops us taking risks, and if you don't go out on the branch, you're never going to get the best fruit.
author: Sarah Parish

quote: Surround yourself with the best people you can find, delegate authority, and don't interfere as long as the policy you've decided upon is being carried out.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: Compassion may be defined as the capacity to be attentive to the experience of others, to wish the best for others, and to sense what will truly serve others.
author: Joan Halifax

quote: Design is a plan for arranging elements in such a way as best to accomplish a particular purpose.
author: Charles Eames

quote: It is with children that we have the best chance of studying the development of logical knowledge, mathematical knowledge, physical knowledge, and so forth.
author: Jean Piaget

quote: Most businesses think that product is the most important thing, but without great leadership, mission and a team that deliver results at a high level, even the best product won't make a company successful.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: If you want to be the best, you have to do things that other people aren't willing to do.
author: Michael Phelps

quote: No man really knows about other human beings. The best he can do is to suppose that they are like himself.
author: John Steinbeck

quote: Right actions in the future are the best apologies for bad actions in the past.
author: Tryon Edwards

quote: Success comes from knowing that you did your best to become the best that you are capable of becoming.
author: John Wooden

quote: In my own relationships, I know that I should break up with someone who doesn't encourage me to be strong and make my own choices and do what's best in my life, so if you're dating someone who doesn't want you to be the best person you can be, you shouldn't be dating them.
author: Veronica Roth

quote: Living well is the best revenge.
author: George Herbert

quote: The best place to find God is in a garden. You can dig for him there.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: The best part of being a mom to me is the unconditional love. I have never felt a love as pure, a love that's as rewarding.
author: Monica Denise Brown

quote: Every job is good if you do your best and work hard. A man who works hard stinks only to the ones that have nothing to do but smell.
author: Laura Ingalls Wilder

quote: A person who has been punished is not less inclined to behave in a given way; at best, he learns how to avoid punishment.
author: B. F. Skinner

quote: Yes'm, old friends is always best, 'less you can catch a new one that's fit to make an old one out of.
author: Sarah Orne Jewett

quote: Choose your corner, pick away at it carefully, intensely and to the best of your ability and that way you might change the world.
author: Charles Eames

quote: The patient's autonomy always, always should be respected, even if it is absolutely contrary - the decision is contrary to best medical advice and what the physician wants.
author: Jack Kevorkian

quote: I would say I'm a nice person, and I take pride in the fact that I treat everyone really well, so there's no reason for anyone to ever come at me because I only want the best for everybody else.
author: Miley Cyrus

quote: Life is short and if you're looking for extension, you had best do well. 'Cause there's good deeds and then there's good intentions. They are as far apart as Heaven and Hell.
author: Ben Harper

quote: The optimist thinks this is the best of all possible worlds. The pessimist fears it is true.
author: J. Robert Oppenheimer

quote: He who knows best knows how little he knows.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: The best way to look stylish on a budget is to try second-hand, bargain hunting, and vintage.
author: Orlando Bloom

quote: I've only had two rules: Do all you can and do it the best you can. It's the only way you ever get that feeling of accomplishing something.
author: Colonel Sanders

quote: In any team sport, the best teams have consistency and chemistry.
author: Roger Staubach

quote: Everybody should be able to enjoy their life, because you only live once. So I just want to get it all out there and be the best role model that I can be, if people want to put me in that kind of predicament. I mean, I didn't ask to be a role model, because I'm not perfect.
author: ASAP Rocky

quote: Being in love is the best feeling on the planet. I really believe that love makes the world go round.
author: Sonam Kapoor

quote: Climate change is destroying our path to sustainability. Ours is a world of looming challenges and increasingly limited resources. Sustainable development offers the best chance to adjust our course.
author: Ban Ki-moon

quote: Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the next moment.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: My siblings are my best friends.
author: America Ferrera

quote: Expect the best, Prepare for the worst.
author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quote: Perfection is impossible just strive to do your best.
author: Angela Watson

quote: The best thinking has been done in solitude. The worst has been done in turmoil.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose. You are already naked. There is no reason not to follow your heart.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: I think the best thing about being pregnant would definitely have to be seeing just my belly grow and seeing, like, wow, there is, you know, something inside of me.
author: Tia Mowry

quote: I am an emotional person, and soccer is sheer emotion. For me, it is the best way to unwind.
author: Martin Winterkorn

quote: The only way to get the best of an argument is to avoid it.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Sometimes you get the best light from a burning bridge.
author: Don Henley

quote: Money is the best rule of commerce.
author: William Petty

quote: The best way to keep one's word is not to give it.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Scouting rises within you and inspires you to put forth your best.
author: Juliette Gordon Low

quote: The best thing is to always keep honest people around, because when you have a bunch of yes men around that know that you're making a mistake but let you go on with it, that's when it ruins your mind state as an artist.
author: Kendrick Lamar

quote: I keep sailing on in this middle passage. I am sailing into the wind and the dark. But I am doing my best to keep my boat steady and my sails full.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Sincere and generous collaboration is the best way to fulfil the legitimate aspirations of each person and achieve great collective goals for the common good and the general interest.
author: Felipe VI of Spain

quote: But the person who scored well on an SAT will not necessarily be the best doctor or the best lawyer or the best businessman. These tests do not measure character, leadership, creativity, perseverance.
author: William Julius Wilson

quote: I think the most productive thing to do during times of change is to be your best self, not the best version of someone else.
author: Seth Godin

quote: I personally think my sister is so stunning without makeup. And she doesn't wear that much makeup because she has the best skin color.
author: Gigi Hadid

quote: The best work is not what is most difficult for you it is what you do best.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: In assisting his 'neighbour' every day to the best of his ability, and keeping truth, honesty, and kindness perpetually before him, the Boy Scout, with as little formality as possible, is pleasing God.
author: Robert Baden-Powell

quote: Throughout our lives, God's grace bestows temporal blessings and spiritual gifts that magnify our abilities and enrich our lives. His grace refines us. His grace helps us become our best selves.
author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quote: As long as you as an individual... can convince yourself that in order to move forward as best you can you have to be optimistic, you can be described as 'one of the faithful,' one of those people who can say, 'Well, look, something's going to happen! Let's just keep trying. Let's not give up.
author: Tom Hanks

quote: The best fiction is geared towards conflict. We learn most about our characters through tension, when they are put up against insurmountable obstacles. This is true in real life.
author: Sufjan Stevens

quote: I think the best way to have confidence is not to allow everyone else's insecurities to be your own.
author: Jessie J

quote: In every aspect of life, have a game plan, and then do your best to achieve it.
author: Alan Kulwicki

quote: I am a gentleman. My natural inclination is to be on my best behavior.
author: Joe Wilson

quote: Looking good is the best revenge.
author: Ivana Trump

quote: Fourth of July. My birthday is July first, and my best friend's birthday is July fifth, so it's always been a favorite holiday. It's all about having a cooler full of sodas, hot dogs, and just hanging out and shooting off firecrackers, being low-key, watching the fireworks.
author: Hilarie Burton

quote: The best liar is he who makes the smallest amount of lying go the longest way.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: The best scientists and explorers have the attributes of kids! They ask question and have a sense of wonder. They have curiosity. 'Who, what, where, why, when, and how!' They never stop asking questions, and I never stop asking questions, just like a five year old.
author: Sylvia Earle

quote: Perfectionism is not the same thing as striving to be our best. Perfectionism is not about healthy achievement and growth it's a shield.
author: Brene Brown

quote: Being in love is the best thing in my life.
author: Olivia Newton-John

quote: If you like an instrument that sings, play the saxophone. At its best it's like the human voice.
author: Stan Getz

quote: Under any circumstance, simply do your best, and you will avoid self-judgment, self-abuse and regret.
author: Don Miguel Ruiz

quote: Love is the best school, but the tuition is high and the homework can be painful.
author: Diane Ackerman

quote: Life is often compared to a marathon, but I think it is more like being a sprinter; long stretches of hard work punctuated by brief moments in which we are given the opportunity to perform at our best.
author: Michael Johnson

quote: The best part of being blonde is forgivable momentary lapses of common sense.
author: Caity Lotz

quote: There are people out there who hate me and who say I'm arrogant, vain, and whatever. That's all part of my success. I am made to be the best.
author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quote: When you're the best, you only want to surround yourself with the best.
author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

quote: I have always served the public to the best of my ability. Why? Because, like every other man, it is to my interest to do so.
author: Cornelius Vanderbilt

quote: Obviously, the highest type of efficiency is that which can utilize existing material to the best advantage.
author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quote: I do not need a trophy to tell myself that I am the best.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: You can't run a government from one single person. What instead matters is that leadership be about gathering around extraordinary individuals and getting the best out of them.
author: Justin Trudeau

quote: When employees are happy, they are your very best ambassadors.
author: James Sinegal

quote: The best things in life are free - and $19.95.
author: Billy Mays

quote: The best luck of all is the luck you make for yourself.
author: Douglas MacArthur

quote: The best way to destroy the capitalist system is to debauch the currency.
author: Vladimir Lenin

quote: Surround yourself with good people. People who are going to be honest with you and look out for your best interests.
author: Derek Jeter
